GS41aryabhcu:5919: kim punar atra yuktam ã purāṇakāraiḥ yathā bhinnapramāṇāni kṛtādīni vyākhyātāni tathā pratipattum,

GS41aryabhcu:6010: suṣamā āditaḥ antataḥ ca gaṇyamāne suṣamā, ekasya padasya āditaḥ aparasya antataḥ iti arthaḥ |

GS41aryabhcu:6070: atha ahargaṇe dṛṣṭe grahagatyānayanam ã yadi yugāhargaṇena grahāṇām gītikābhihitabhagaṇāḥ labhyante anena ahargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti,

GS41aryabhcu:6230: tataḥ kṛṣṇapakṣapratipatprabhṛtyanurādhādiṣu gaṇyamānāsu rohiṇyā amāvāsyāyāḥ ca yogaḥ saṃbhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6237: aparapakṣe śrāddham kurvīta ūrdhvam vā caturthyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6238: iti atra kṛṣṇādi[māsatvāt] pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ, aparaḥ śuklaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6239: aparatvāt śuklapakṣasya śuklapakṣe eva śrāddhavidhiḥ prāpnoti na kṛṣṇe,
GS41aryabhcu:6242: tataḥ “yugavarṣamāsadivasāḥ samam pravṛttāḥ tu caitraśuklādeḥ” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6244: yugādīnām caitra[śuklāditaḥ pravṛtti]tvāt kālasya ādimattāprasaṅgaḥ iti āha ã kālaḥ ayam anādyantaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6245: ayam kālaḥ asmābhiḥ yugādiḥ abhihitaḥ, caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛttaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6246: na asya antaḥ na asya ādiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6248: yadi kālasya ādiḥ syāt tataḥ kim syāt?
GS41aryabhcu:6249: āha ã saṃsārasya ādimattā prāpnoti, iṣyate ca anādiḥ saṃsāraḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6251: katham punar asya ādiḥ vyavahārārtham parikalpitaḥ iti āha ã grahabhaiḥ anumīyate kṣetre |
GS41aryabhcu:6253: taiḥ grahabhaiḥ anumīyate ādiḥ antaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:6254: “māṅ māne” [pāṇinīyadhātupāṭhaḥ 1143] iti ayam dhātuḥ dhūmāt agnyanumānam iti atra māne vartate |
GS41aryabhcu:6255: atra punar grahabhaiḥ anumīyate iti mānārthaḥ eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6256: vrīhyādirāśayaḥ prasthādibhiḥ anumīyante, kuṅkumādayaḥ vā palādibhiḥ, evam grahabhaiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6258: mīnameṣasandhau kṣitisaṃyuktāḥ tadā yugasya ādiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6259: kaḥ bhuvaḥ grahasya ca yogaḥ, dvayoḥ atyantaviprakṛṣṭayoḥ? na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6260: mukhyasya yogasya asaṃbhavāt gauṇaḥ yogaḥ parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6261: yatra bhūlagnaḥ iva grahaḥ lakṣyate sa bhūgrahayoḥ yogaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6262: sa ca udayāstamayayoḥ saṃbhavati iti udayāstamayayoḥ vā parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6263: anye punar anyathā vyāvarṇayanti ã grahabhaiḥ anumīyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6264: grahaiḥ ca nakṣatraiḥ ca kālasya ādiḥ antaḥ ca parikalpyate | tat yathā ã
GS41aryabhcu:6266: tasmāt saṃvatsaraḥ māsāt bārhaspatyaḥ pragaṇyatām || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6268: loke ca evam vaktāraḥ bhavanti ã “svātau udite prasthāsyāmahe udayaḥ ” iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6272: kṣetram bhagolaḥ, tasmin bhagole, nakṣatragrahacāravaśāt ādiḥ antaḥ ca parikalpitaḥ || 11 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6277: ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdānām ādityavarṣāṇām ṣaṣṭyā grahāḥ nakṣatrakakṣyām prapūrayanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6278: nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni svāsu svāsu kakṣyāsu gacchanti iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6279: [kiyadyojanāni] punar nakṣatrakakṣyāyām grahāḥ sūryābdānām ṣaṣṭyā pūrayanti?
GS41aryabhcu:6282: kim tarhi? kā eṣā pratipāditā iti? ucyate ã “bhavāṃśe arkaḥ” [gītikāí, 6] iti | atra katham
GS41aryabhcu:6283: punar etena eva nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni gacchanti iti ucyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6284: yadi khyughṛ-tulyaiḥ arkavarṣaiḥ svān-svān bhagaṇān grahāḥ bhuñjante [tadā] ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6286: punar ṣaṣṭibhāgena ete[ṣām] khyughṛ-tulyānām arkavarṣāṇām dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi |
GS41aryabhcu:6288: tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena pratisvakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena kā iti sarvagrahebhyaḥ nakṣatrakakṣyā
GS41aryabhcu:6291: divi bhavam divyam, yugam iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6293: yasmāt divi sañcaratām grahāṇām ekatra yogaḥ bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:6294: ataḥ [divyam yugam uktam tena] divyena nabhaḥparidhim |
GS41aryabhcu:6295: nabhasaḥ paridhiḥ nabhaḥparidhiḥ, ākāśakakṣyā iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6296: katham idam ucyate? nanu ca viyat aparimitayojanapramāṇam iti śrūyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6297: tasya parimitayojanapramāṇam katham kakṣyā bhavet? ucyate ã viyat asmākam yāvat
GS41aryabhcu:6300: atra khakakṣyābhidhānena etat pratipādayati, iyatpramāṇam viyadarkamarīcayaḥ prāpnuvanti iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6303: yāvanti yojanāni svakakṣyāyām śaśī saṃcarati tāvanti eva yojanāni ārkiḥ api svakakṣyāyām sañcarati |
GS41aryabhcu:6304: tat yathā ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena svakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6305: athavā ã ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena nakṣatrakakṣyā labhyate svaiḥ yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6308: [yuga]bhūdinaiḥ sarve eva svāsu kakṣyāsu samagatyā bhramantaḥ [kha]kakṣyātulyāni yojanāni prayānti,
GS41aryabhcu:6309: ekena ahnā kiyanti iti sarvagrahāṇām yojanagatā dinabhuktiḥ labhyate iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6310: khakakṣyāyām bhūdinaiḥ bhāge hṛte yojanagatā grahāṇām dinabhuktiḥ labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6311: tayā trairāśikam bhaṅktvā madhyamagrahāḥ ānīyante ã yadi svakakṣyāyojanaiḥ bhagaṇaḥ labhyate tadā gatiyojanaiḥ kim iti āhnikī bhuktiḥ labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6312: tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena ahnā bhuktiḥ labhyate ahargaṇena
GS41aryabhcu:6315: ] ataḥ guṇakārabhāgahārayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ ahargaṇasya dina[gati]yojanāni guṇakāraḥ sthitaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6318: ambarakakṣyā bhūdinahṛtā phalam tatra yojanāni teṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:6320: iti | a[thavā khakakṣyā]hargaṇasaṃvarge svakakṣyābhūdinasaṃvargahṛte bhagaṇādayaḥ bhavanti || 12 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6323: maṇḍalam alpam adhastāt kālena alpena pūrayati candraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6324: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām mahat ca mahatā śanaiḥ cārī || 13 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6326: sarveṣām adhaḥ vyavasthitam maṇḍalam alpam alpe[na kālena pūraya]ti candramāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6327: adhastāt iti anena eva maṇḍalasya alpatvasiddhiḥ, alpam iti etat na vaktavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6328: katham adhastāt iti etāvati ucyamāne maṇḍalasya alpatvam gamyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6329: ucyate ã upari upari kakṣyāḥ vyavasthitāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6330: tāsām upari upari vyavasthitānām adhaḥ yā vyavasthitā sā sarvatanīyasī |
GS41aryabhcu:6334: 15] iti atra kakṣyāṇām upari upari vyavasthitim vakṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:6335: nanu ca anye bruvate ã sarveṣām upari candramasaḥ kakṣyā iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6337: ] sarveṣām grahāṇām adhaḥ candrakakṣyā iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:6338: yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatra[tārāḥ dṛśyeran] |
GS41aryabhcu:6339: sūryavaśāt yadi upari candraḥ syāt tadā sūryeṇa ārāt vyavasthitena sadā candramasoḥ api svasya ārāt bhāgam akhaṇḍam dṛśyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:6342: anye punar sugata[matā]valambinaḥ sūryācandramasoḥ ekām kakṣyām ācakṣate ã
GS41aryabhcu:6344: ardharātraḥ astagamanam madhyāhnaḥ udayaḥ sakṛt || iti ||
GS41aryabhcu:6347: ekapañcāśat [yojanāni] sūryaḥ tadā kim iti sūryaḥ [na] mahān upalabhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6349: atha vidūratvāt arkaḥ na mahān upalakṣyate iti cet na |
GS41aryabhcu:6351: anyat ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt sūryācandramasoḥ sūryagrahaṇam na eva syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6352: na ca candramasam muktvā anyaḥ rāhuḥ asti yena savitā chādyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6354: syāt tathā api mahattvāt sūryabimbasya na eva arkaḥ sakalaḥ chādyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6355: na eva arkaḥ candreṇa chādyate iti cet tat api uttaratra vyākhyāsyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6358: kim? tat alpam maṇḍalam adhaḥ vyavasthitam |
GS41aryabhcu:6359: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām maṇḍalānām mahat maṇḍalam mahatā kālena śanaiḥ caraḥ pūrayati |
GS41aryabhcu:6360: etau alpamahatkakṣyāmaṇḍalaparimāṇau grahau uddiṣṭau, anyeṣām ca [maṇḍalāni svabuddhyā vijñeyāni] |
GS41aryabhcu:6361: tat yathā ã candramāḥ divasasaṅkhyayā saptaviṃśatyā sārdhaikayā maṇḍalam gacchati,
GS41aryabhcu:6365: guruḥ] tu varṣaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6366: śanaiścaraḥ tu triṃśatā varṣaiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6367: evam ete bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ grahāḥ vyākhyātāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6368: atha yadi tulyakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva syuḥ tadā eteṣām yugādeḥ saṃpravṛttānām na kadācit viyogaḥ syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6369: atha [yadi] yojanagatena ete bhinnagatayaḥ syuḥ tadā eteṣām bhuktiliptānayane yojanaiḥ yathāsvam prasiddhabhuktiliptāḥ na āgaccheyuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6370: tasmāt bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ api grahāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva iti || 13 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6372: kakṣyāṇām alpamahattvāt rāśibhāgaliptāḥ bahvyaḥ alpāḥ iti sandehaḥ tannivṛttyartham āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6373: alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6374: aṃśāḥ kalāḥ tathā evam vibhāgatulyāḥ svakakṣyāsu || 14 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6375: alpe maṇḍale alpāḥ rāśayaḥ mahati maṇḍale mahāntaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6378: tat yathā ã alpe mahati ca maṇḍale maṇḍaladvādaśabhāgaḥ rāśiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6383: kakṣyāṇām upari adhaḥ ava[sthiti]kramaparijñānāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6385: eṣām adhaḥ ca bhūmiḥ medhībhūtā khamadhyasthā || 15 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6387: teṣām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ, tasya api adhaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ, tataḥ aṅgārakaḥ iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:6391: atra “bhūta“-śabdaḥ bahuṣu artheṣu vartamānaḥ iva arthe pratipattavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6394: kham ākāśam tasya madhyam khamadhyam, tasmin sthitā khamadhyasthā |
GS41aryabhcu:6397: cakrārdhe grahanakṣatrāṇi, tadā teṣām adhaḥ bhūmiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6398: yadā ataḥ anyeṣu grahanakṣatrāṇi smararipusutahibukasahajadhaneṣu vartante tadā katham adhaḥ bhūḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6406: tadvat hi sarvasattvaiḥ jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca bhūgolaḥ || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6410: tat yathā ã yā]vat alpamaṇḍalam bhāni bhramanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6411: tāvat mahānti maṇḍalāni śanaiścarādayaḥ [na] śaknuvanti pūrayitum iti pṛṣṭhataḥ lakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6413: atra parihāraḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ ã yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatratārāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6417: ataḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ īṣamandagatiḥ īṣat jīyate, atimandagatiḥ tu dūrāt iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6418: īṣanmandagatitvāt śanaiścaraḥ iṣat jīyate, atimandagatitvāt candramāḥ [dū]ram iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6419: atra api yadi prāṅmukhāḥ grahādayaḥ tadā prāṅmukhaiḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ jīyamānaḥ aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ revatyām upalakṣyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:6421: api ca, pratilomagatitvāt aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ bharaṇyām eva upalakṣyeta |
GS41aryabhcu:6423: tathā api vakrakāle aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ pratilomagatitvāt bharaṇyām upalakṣyeta |
GS41aryabhcu:6425: anyat ca ã anyonyabimbacchādanam na syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6426: grahoparāgaḥ api ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt na yujyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6427: tasmāt “bhānām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi suṣṭhu uktam || 15 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6430: sapta ete horeśāḥ śanaiścarādyāḥ yathākramam śīghrāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6432: ete grahāḥ śanaiścarādayaḥ tulyagatayaḥ api santaḥ yathākrameṇa śīghrāḥ lakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6435: tat yathā ã śanaiścarasya kālahorāyām nivṛttāyām bṛhaspateḥ kālahorā,
GS41aryabhcu:6438: evam sūryodayāt prabhṛti yāvat sūryasya ardhāstamayaḥ iti dvādaśa kālahorāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6439: tataḥ ca ardhāstamayāt ardhodayaḥ iti punar dvādaśa |
GS41aryabhcu:6443: sā ca divase divase divasādhipātaḥ prabhṛti pratipattavyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6446: horeśvarāḥ taddivasādhipādikrameṇa tāḥ tatra caturguṇāḥ ṣaṭ ||
GS41aryabhcu:6447: evam divasādhipāt sūryodayāt gaṇyamānāt uttaradivasasya adhipāt eva ardhodayāt śīghrakramāt caturthaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6448: yaḥ śīghrakramaḥ abhihitaḥ “bhānām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi tasmāt caturthaḥ divasādhipatiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6449: tat yathā ã śanaiścarāt caturthaḥ sūryaḥ divasādhipatiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6452: evam anena krameṇa māsādhipāḥ abdādhipāḥ ca avagantavyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6453: katham? [māsasya varṣasya ca yaḥ] prathamadivase adhipaḥ sa māsādhipaḥ varṣādhipaḥ ca
GS41aryabhcu:6456: yadi api śeṣeṇa uktaḥ sūryodayaśeṣeṇa ardhodayaḥ pratipattavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6458: idam bimbāvayavābhidhāne api tadavayavapramāṇasya mānakālāvadhāraṇāśakyatvāt ardhodayasya ca vyaktalakṣaṇatvāt suparicchedanayā ardhodayaḥ āśriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6459: athavā anirdiṣṭeṣu vastuṣu madhyamapratipatteḥ ardhodayāt ārabhya punar ardhodayaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6460: atra kecit ardhāstamayāt vārapravṛttim manyante | tat ca ayuktam | yasmāt uktam ã
GS41aryabhcu:6465: yadā protpannaḥ sahasrakiraṇaḥ tadā prabhṛti vārādivyavahāraḥ sañjātaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6466: ataḥ suṣṭhu uktam sūryodayāt dinapāḥ iti || 16 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6468: ete grahāḥ kasmin maṇḍale bhramanti iti [na jñāyate] ataḥ tannirūpaṇāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6470: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghhroccāt || 17 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6471: kakṣyāyāḥ pratimaṇḍalam kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalam, tat gacchanti iti kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalagāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6472: athavā kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale, te gacchanti iti kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalagāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6474: athavā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ sa kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalaśabdena ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6476: atra anekatvāt vigrahayogasya, katamaḥ vigrahaḥ parigṛhyate iti sandehe
GS41aryabhcu:6477: ucyate ã kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale |
GS41aryabhcu:6478: te gacchanti iti kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalagāḥ, iti ayam parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6479: katham? iṣṭatvāt śeṣavigrahārthavācakatvāt ca atra iṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6482: atha ke te madhyamāḥ, ke vā sphuṭāḥ grahāḥ?
GS41aryabhcu:6483: nanu ca ekaḥ eva sūryaḥ, ekaḥ eva candramāḥ, ekaḥ eva aṅgārakaḥ iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:6485: na evam vijñāyate madhyamaḥ grahaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6489: tat yathā ã kaścit sāṃvatsaram pṛcchati ã “kaḥ savitā” iti, sa tasmā āha ã rāśiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6490: ekaḥ pañcadaśa bhāgāḥ triṃśat liptāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6491: tatra yaḥ paripṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe tayoḥ ubhayoḥ abhi[prāya]dvayaprasaṅgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6493: yā madhyamā gatiḥ sā sphuṭagatisādhanasya upāyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6494: anyathā aniyatatvāt sphuṭagatiḥ aśakyā syāt vijñātum |
GS41aryabhcu:6496: yat asya grahasya vyāsārdhatulyam bhūtārāgrahavivaram sa tasmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya upari adhaḥ vā avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:6498: ucyate ã yadā tṛtīye karmaṇi dvitīye pade mandoccakendram rāśitrayam dvau bhāgau pañcāśat liptāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6500: caturthe karmaṇi yadā śīghroccakendram rāśitrayam pañcabhāgāḥ viṃśatiḥ ca kalā,
GS41aryabhcu:6503: asmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti bhūtārāgrahavivaram pratidinam apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6506: bhramanti sarve grahāḥ svacāreṇa iti etat nigadavyākhyānam eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6509: tena mandoccāt hetoḥ anulomam iti vyākhyāyate, yasmāt na mandocce vakraparijñānam |
GS41aryabhcu:6511: śīghroccāt hetoḥ pratilomam, yasmāt śīghrocce vakraparijñānam |
GS41aryabhcu:6513: ucyate ã yadā śīghroccakendram dvitīyapade tadā sarve grahāḥ vakriṇaḥ bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6517: bhavet vakrātivakrā ca tathā anukuṭilā gatiḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:6520: ucyate ã yadā adyatanāt grahāt śvastanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ bhavati tadā vakraprārambhaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6521: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ tadā api vakraprārambhaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6522: yadā adyatanāt tṛtīyapade śvastanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tadā vakrasya nivṛttiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6523: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tṛtīyapade tadā api vakrasya nivṛttiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6524: yadā grahaḥ bahvīḥ liptāḥ nivartate tadā ativakragatiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6525: katham punar idam vidhānam śīghroccāt eva gaṇakaḥ prajānate, na punar mandoccāt iti?
GS41aryabhcu:6526: ucyate ã yasmāt sūryavaśāt grahāṇām udayāstamayavakrānuvakrāḥ gatayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6527: yadi evam atra katham budhaśukrayoḥ anyat śīghroccam, [madhyaḥ] sūryaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6528: atra api sūryavaśāt eva tayoḥ udayāstamayaparijñānam |
GS41aryabhcu:6530: athavā uccanīcamadhyamaparidhiḥ iti evamādisphuṭagatisādhanopāya[bhūtānām ca] upāyānām na [eva niyamo]ktiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6533: tasmāt iyam sarvā prakriyā asatyā, yayā grahāṇām sphuṭagatiḥ sādhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6535: tathā hi bhiṣajaḥ hi utpalanālādiṣu vadhādīni abhyasyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6538: śābdikāḥ prakṛtipratyayavikārāgamavarṇalopavyatyayādibhiḥ śabdān pratijānate | evam atra api
GS41aryabhcu:6540: tasmāt upāyeṣu asatyeṣu satyapratipādanapareṣu na codyam asti |
GS41aryabhcu:6541: atha kim artham ime grahāḥ pratidinam bhrāmyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6542: atha ca loke kaścit bhraman kāraṇena bhramati |
GS41aryabhcu:6543: anyat ca ã na evaṃvidhaḥ kaścit dṛśyate anavaratagatiḥ yathā ime tārāgrahāḥ bhramanti iti dṛṣṭāntatvena udāharaṇabhūtaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6544: ucyate ã sarvādau kila bhagavān prajāpatiḥ grahān uktavān yat “bhavantaḥ meṣādigaṇeṣu prajānām śubhāśubhaphalāya bhrāmyata” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6555: śrūyante ca śabdāḥ ye ca apare atra gativācakāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6558: 5.1.76] iti anena nityam panthānam gacchati iti asmin arthe pānthaḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6559: atra loke na kaścit adhvānam anavaratam gacchan dṛśyate, tasmāt amī eva grahāḥ pānthāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6560: na ca ayam śabdaḥ asatsvārtheṣu śaśaviṣāṇakūrmaromavandhyāputraśabdavat pravṛttaḥ | tasmāt
GS41aryabhcu:6561: suṣṭhu ucyate śabdena arthānumānam pānthāḥ grahāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6563: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghroccāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6564: mandoccāt yataḥ mandoccakendrāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam pratyaham upacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6568: yasmāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam sarvadā apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6572: sphuṭāḥ pratimaṇḍale bhramanti iti uktam, ataḥ tajjñāpanāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6573: kakṣyāmaṇḍalatulyam svam svam pratimaṇḍalam bhavati eṣām |
GS41aryabhcu:6577: kakṣyāmaṇḍalapramāṇam “śaśirāśayaṣṭha cakram” [gītikāí, 6] iti etasmin sūtre vyākhyātam |
GS41aryabhcu:6578: svam svam pratimaṇḍalam ātmīyam ātmīyam pratimaṇḍalam, bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6581: yat madhyam kendram tat ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam |
GS41aryabhcu:6582: ghanāḥ ca asau bhūḥ ca ghanabhūḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6586: tat yathā ã yāvat pramāṇaparikalpitam ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṃśāvacchinnam kakṣyāmaṇḍalam pūrvāparam ūrdhvam vinyasya,
GS41aryabhcu:6587: tādṛś eva anyat maṇḍalam upari adhaḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt vakṣyamāṇena antareṇa pūrvāparayoḥ diśoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yat badhyate gole tatpratimaṇḍalam nāma |
GS41aryabhcu:6592: vṛttaparidhau grahāḥ te madhyamacārāt bhramanti evam || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6598: tat yathā ã “jhārdhāni mandavṛttam” iti adhikṛtya “śaśinaḥ cha” [gītikāí,
GS41aryabhcu:6604: 10] iti evamādeḥ paridheḥ ayutatulyam vyāsārdham labhyate tadā sārdhaikatriṃśadbhāgapramāṇasya paridheḥ kim iti labdham bhāgāḥ pañca,
GS41aryabhcu:6608: tasya ca trairāśikena svavṛttaviṣkambhārdham labdham bhāgadvayam,
GS41aryabhcu:6611: vyāsārdham labhyate tadā uccanīcaparidheḥ kim iti labdham candrasya uccanīcavyāsārdham liptātriśatī sārdhādhikarūpā |
GS41aryabhcu:6613: tatra bhāgapramāṇena liptāpramāṇena vā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalamadhyāntaram parikalpyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6615: anyathā anyeṣām samaviṣamavṛttamandoccaśīghroccabhedena anekapratimaṇḍalaprasaṅgabhayāt uttaratra vakṣyati ã “bhūtārāgrahavivaram” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:6617: kakṣyāmaṇḍalam, tasmin vṛttaparidhau madhyamacāram grahāḥ bhramanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6618: pratimaṇḍaleṣu sphuṭacāram bhramanti iti arthāt avasīyate || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6622: anulomagatiḥ vṛtte mandagatiḥ yaḥ grahaḥ bhavati || 20 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6624: śīghragatiḥ ca tat svoccam ca śīghragatiḥ svoccam,
GS41aryabhcu:6627_1: tadā sā eva sphuṭamadhyamā bhuktiḥ svakendrāntajyāsādhitā svaśīghroccabhukteḥ pratilome[na] pātyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6632: pratilomā gatiḥ yasya saḥ pratilomagatiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6633: āditaḥ eva etat bhuktyānayanam prati vakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6634: tat yathā ã mandoccakendrāntajyām krameṇa utkrameṇa vā niṣpannām svamadhyamabhuktiliptābhiḥ guṇayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6635_0: punar ca tat kālapratidhinā guṇitasya aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ bhāgalabdham kendrapadavaśāt
GS41aryabhcu:6635_1: ardhīkṛtya grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu prakṣipya viśodhya vā svaśīghroccabhuktiliptābhiḥ śodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6640: labhdasya ardham kendrapadavaśāt grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu kṣipet, viśodhayet vā |
GS41aryabhcu:6641: tataḥ tam kṣiptaviśodhitaśeṣam gṛhītvā tṛtīyakarma ã mandoccakendrāntajyākramotkramajyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:6642: labdham samastam eva grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu mandakendrapadavaśāt kṣipet, viśodhayet vā |
GS41aryabhcu:6645: śeṣam [gṛhītvā] caturthakarma ã śīghroccakendrānta[jyākramotkrama]jyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:6647: tatra yad avāptam tat yadi kṣepyam sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu kṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:6649: atha viśodhyam sad yadi sphuṭamadhyamabhuktitaḥ na patati tadā pratilomagatiḥ grahaḥ sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāḥ eva viparītam
GS41aryabhcu:6650: śodhyāḥ | śeṣam vakrabhogaḥ | asmin arthe iyam kārikā ã
GS41aryabhcu:6655: yadā śīghroccāt śīghroccakendrāntajyāniṣpannā liptāḥ sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptābhyaḥ viśuddhāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6658: tataḥ arthāt ayam vigrahaḥ avasitaḥ ã anulomā gatiḥ yasya sa anulomagatiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6659: sa ca alpam gaccahati iti mandagatiḥ abhidhīyate || 20 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6665: tat uktam ã mandāt, uktamandoccāvadheḥ madhyamāt iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6666: tat atra api śīghroccāvadheḥ madhyamāt iti etat ekaprakrameṇa bhavitavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6667: na iti āha ã śīghrā[t pratilomaga]tiḥ pratilomāvadheḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6668: śīghroccasya pratilomagatīni viparītagatīni yāni vṛttāni paridhayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6669: atra vṛttasya ekadeśe vṛttaśabdopa[cārāt paridhayaḥ ca] iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6671: ataḥ tāni dhanūṃṣi mandakendrāt jātāni krameṇa
GS41aryabhcu:6674: katham punar vṛttāni mandaśīghrakendrayoḥ tajjyādhanūṃṣi kramotkrama[gatīni?
GS41aryabhcu:6676: gatiḥ asti iti bhūtānām sukumārāyate manaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6677: [anastvaniśam eva ūḍham dhuram] vahati gauḥ iva ||
GS41aryabhcu:6679: dānam bhogaḥ nāśaḥ tisraḥ gatayaḥ bhavanti vittasya |
GS41aryabhcu:6680: yaḥ na dadāti na bhuṅkte tasya tṛtīyā gatiḥ bhavati ||
GS41aryabhcu:6682: tasmāt yāni eva jyādhanūṃṣi tāni eva pratilomānulomagatīni |
GS41aryabhcu:6683: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã mandoccajyādhanūṃṣi mandoccāt upacīyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6690: athavā mandoccaśīghroccaśravaṇāt mandoccaśīghroccayoḥ eva pratipattiḥ, anyasya aśrutatvāt ca |
GS41aryabhcu:6692: ayam āryāsūtrārthaḥ yathā ghaṭate tathā karmaṇā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6694: śeṣam rāśyādikam mandoccāt pravṛttam tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam iti pratimaṇḍale kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6696: tena tasmāt mandoccāt ārabhya yat kāṣṭham tat mahati maṇḍale alpam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6699: alpe pratimaṇḍale tat eva kāṣṭham bahutaram
GS41aryabhcu:6701: vrīhyādayaḥ mahatā mānaviśeṣeṇa pramīyamānāḥ prasthādisaṅkhyayā alpāḥ bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6702: [te] eva alpena mānaviśeṣeṇa mīyamānāḥ prasthādiśaṅkhyayā bahavaḥ bhavanti evam atra api |
GS41aryabhcu:6703: katham punar tat kāṣṭham kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam pratimaṇḍale pramīyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6704: ucyate ã tat kāṣṭhasya padāni vyatītāni pratyākalayya vartamānapadasya bhujākoṭijyayā karma idam kriyate ã “pratimaṇḍalasya madhyam ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:6705: 18] iti pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram koṭyām prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6707: etat pratipādanārtham samāyāmavanau vṛttakendram nidhāya yāvat tāvat pramāṇaparikalpitavyāsārdhapramāṇena karkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:6708_1: [sūtram mandoccābhimukham] dakṣiṇena nidhāya tatra kakṣyāmaṇḍalavyāsārdhatulyakarkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:6712: tatra yā koṭijyā sā kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannā kakṣyāmaṇḍalabhūmyantarālapramāṇā |
GS41aryabhcu:6713: tena pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarāntarālamātreṇa pratimaṇḍalam prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ koṭiḥ na prāpnoti iti prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6714: dvitīyatṛtīyapadayoḥ tāvatā atītāt pratimaṇḍalāt koṭiḥ iti apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6716: atha yadi koṭi[jyātaḥ] pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram na śudhyati,
GS41aryabhcu:6719: | tatra evam niṣpannāyāḥ koṭeḥ bhujajyāyāḥ ca vargasamāsamūlam karṇaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6720: tat sūkṣmārthibhiḥ aviśiṣyate, pratimaṇḍalakarṇasya vṛddhihrāsavaśāt dṛṣṭiḥ bhidyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6721: tat yadi vyāsārdhatulyena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena yathā uktam pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram labhyate tadā tena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena kim iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6724: tena punar pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarānayanam iti yāvat aviśeṣaḥ | tataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6725: aviśiṣṭakarṇena vyastatrairāśikam kriyate ã yadi vyāsārdhaviṣkambhasya kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya iyam bhujajyā labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6726: tadā tena karṇena pratimaṇḍalajena kā iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6727: vyastatrairāśikatvāt vyāsārdham guṇakāraḥ, karṇaḥ bhāgahāraḥ, labdham pratimaṇḍalabhujajyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6728: tat kāṣṭham mandocce prakṣipya sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhavati, yasya mandoccakendram prathamapade |
GS41aryabhcu:6729: dvitīyapade ṣaḍbhyaḥ rāśibhyaḥ viśodhya bhujā gṛhītā iti ṣaṅbhyaḥ apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6731: tṛtīyapade cakrārdhādhikabhujā iti tat cāpam cakrārdhasahitam mandocce prakṣipyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6732: caturthapade dvādaśebhyaḥ viśuddhaśeṣam bhujā iti cakrāt tat kāṣṭham viśodhya śeṣam mandocce prakṣipyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6733: evam sphuṭagrahaḥ bhavati, yasya śīghroccam na vidyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6734: yeṣām punar śīghroccam vidyate teṣām karmaviśeṣaḥ ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6735: tat yathā ã paridhicālanāprayogeṇa sphuṭīkṛtaparidhinā vyāsārdham samguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdham pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram mandaśīghroccayoḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6739: madhyamasya grahasya [ca] yat antarārdham tat madhyamāt mandoccasiddhe adhike madhyamagrahe dhanam, ūne ṛṇam
GS41aryabhcu:6741: etat eva karma “śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇadhanam bhavati pūrvam” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:6743: katham? sanigurukujeṣu, mandāraguruṣu madhyameṣu madhyamakarmaṇā siddheṣu mandāraguruṣu iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6745: 22] iti kasya ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā bhavati iti atra sampradāyāvicchedāt mandasiddhamadhyamāntaram parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6747: dhanam ṛṇam vā pūrvasiddhe mandoccakarmaṇi bhavati?
GS41aryabhcu:6748: idam ca karma mandoccaśīghroccayoḥ sāmānyena prasiddham |
GS41aryabhcu:6750: tat yathā ã evam ardhena phalena saṃskṛtam madhyamam graham śīghroccāt grahāt viśodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6751_0: tatra kendrapadavibhāgena bhujākoṭijye gṛhītvā sphuṭīkṛtasvaśīghroccaparidhinā vyāsārdham
GS41aryabhcu:6751_1: saṃguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdhapratimaṇḍalabhūvivareṇa pūrvakarmaṇā eva saṃskṛtāt karṇam
GS41aryabhcu:6753: tataḥ bhujajyayā vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāgalabdhasya kāṣṭham śīghroccakendre prathamapade śīghroccāt apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6754: dvitīye pade ṣaḍbhyaḥ viśodhya śeṣam śīghroccāt apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6759: tasya mandoccasiddhasya ca pūrvavat eva antarārdham mandoccasiddhe pūrvakalpanayā
GS41aryabhcu:6761: tat mandaśīghra[siddha]m avinaṣṭam vidhāya tasmāt mandoccam viśodhya pūrvavat eva mandoccam sādhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6762: tasya mandoccasiddhasya dvisaṃskṛtasya avinaṣṭasthāpitasya ca yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tam sakalam eva dvisaṃskṛtahīnamadhyamāt viśodhayet,
GS41aryabhcu:6764: [arthāt dvisaṃskṛtamandasiddhe ūne sati viśodhayet anyathā prakṣipet] |
GS41aryabhcu:6765: tam evaṃkṛtam śīghroccāt viśodhya śīghroccaprasiddhakarmaṇā saṃsiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS41aryabhcu:6766: iti | etat eva karma saṃkṣepeṇa asmābhiḥ karmanibandhe uktam ã
GS41aryabhcu:6768: mandocce pūrvavat kuryāt śīghroccāt tat viśodhyate ||
GS41aryabhcu:6769: tat eva kevalam śodhyam [cakrārdhāt śodhya tat calāt] |
GS41aryabhcu:6770: cakrārdhasaṃyutam cāpam cakrāt śuddham ca śeṣayoḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:6772: tyaktvā padeṣu yuktvā vā karṇaḥ prāgvat prasādhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6774: mandasiddhe adhike hīne rahitaḥ madhyamaḥ grahaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:6775: sa śīghroccāt punar sādhyaḥ siddhayoḥ antarālajam |
GS41aryabhcu:6778: mandasiddhasya tasya ayam viśeṣaḥ yaḥ abhidhāsyate ||
GS41aryabhcu:6780: prāgvat tat madhyame kṛtvā śīghrasiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:6783: tena budhaśukrayoḥ api idam karma kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6787: kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnam ca tat svavṛttamadhyam ca kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6790: yaḥ asau madhyaḥ grahaḥ sa kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhye bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6791: etat uktam bhavati ã kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yaḥ asau madhyamagrahaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6798: mandoccāt prabhṛti yāni mandoccavṛttāni mandoccāt ārabhya anulomam gacchanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6801: śīghrāt śīghroccāt ārabhya yāni śīghroccavṛttāni tāni pratilomam gacchanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6803: atra idam praṣṭavyam ã katham vā mandoccakendram
GS41aryabhcu:6804: ahar ahar upacīyate, katham vā śīghroccakendram ahar ahar apacīyate iti?
GS41aryabhcu:6805: ucyate ã grahāt patite mandocce [mandakendra]bhuktayaḥ upacīyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6807: yadi evam grahāt śīghroccam na patati mahattvāt tarhi maṇḍalam prakṣipya pātyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6812: tatra grahabhagaṇebhyaḥ śīghroccabhagaṇāḥ eva tāvat na
GS41aryabhcu:6814: kutaḥ asau bhagaṇaḥ yam prakṣipya śīghroccam viśodhyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6815: tasmāt gaṇitayuktyā yāni api śīghravṛttāni tāni api anulomagāni eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6816: ācāryeṇa tu karaṇalāghavārtham “pratilomagāni vṛttāni” iti uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:6818: yadi grahaḥ śīghroccāt patati tadā grahaḥ śīghroccāt viśodhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6819: yadā ca śīghroccam grahāt patati tadā grahāt śīghroccam viśodhyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6820: satyam eva etat, kintu jyāparidhikalpanā vyabhicarati |
GS41aryabhcu:6822: viśodhitam bhavati tadā anyathā jyā anyathā paridhiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6823: tadānīm eva śīghroccāt viśuddhe grahe anyathā jyā anyathā eva paridhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6824: atha manyate śīghroccaviśuddhe grahe yat prathamapadam tat caturthapadam,
GS41aryabhcu:6828: evam tarhi yat jyāyasī kalpanā, tasmāt mandoccam grahāt viśodhyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6833: athavā kakṣyā ca sā maṇḍalam ca tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalam |
GS41aryabhcu:6838: tat ca sāmānyena mandavṛttam śīghravṛttam ca parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6840: tatra grahasya madhyaḥ, sa ca kakṣyāmaṇḍalāsaktaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6843: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale yathā madhyam bhavati tathā badhnīyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6844: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale jyā avitiṣṭhate tathā eva avatiṣṭhamānā draṣṭavyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6846: evam atra api ṣaṇṇavatyaṃśakā kāṣṭhajyā parikalpanīyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6847: tat yathā ã uccāt ārabhya bhujajyākoṭijyābhyām trairāśikam ã yadi ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidhau ime bhujajyākoṭijye,
GS41aryabhcu:6850: athavā ã vyāsārdhena ime bhujajyākoṭijye, tataḥ antyaphalatulyena uccanīcavṛttavyāsārdhena ke iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6852: tatra prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhāt upari koṭisādhanam sthitam iti vyāsārdhe prakṣipyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6853: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhonam pravṛttam iti vyāsārdhāt apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6854: evam koṭikā niṣpannā bhavati, bhujākoṭivargasamāsamūlam karṇaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6859: śanigurukujeṣu mandāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrve || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6861: kṣayaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca kṣayaḥ ca kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6863: tat yathā ã prathame pade kṣayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6868: padakramaḥ ca kasmāt parigṛhyate iti āha ã mandoccāt pravṛttāt grahāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6869: kutaḥ? ucyate ã “mandoccāt” iyam pañcamī maryādābhidhāyinī |
GS41aryabhcu:6870: tataḥ mandoccāt iti anena mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6871: sa katham mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ? ucyate ã na atra kiñcit api jñeyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6872: yāvadbhiḥ mandoccāt adhikaḥ grahaḥ tavatā asau mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6873: tena tatparijñānārtham mandoccam grahāt pātyate, tatra śeṣeṇa rāśyādinā mandoccāt
GS41aryabhcu:6875: tasmāt prathamapade yā kramajyā tasyāḥ phalam trairāśikena ānīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6876: yadi ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidheḥ iyam jyā, tadā iṣṭagrahaparidheḥ kā iti phalam labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6884: punar tṛtīyapade krameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti kramajyāphalam dhanam |
GS41aryabhcu:6885: caturthe pade utkrameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti utkramajyāphalam kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6886: tatra prathamapade eva mandakendram, tat utpannam eva phalam grahamadhye kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6887: yadā dvitīyapade kendram tadā prathamapadavyāsārdhajyotpannam aśeṣaphalam kṣayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6890: athavā karaṇalāghavārtham evam kriyate ã prathamapade yat utpannam krameṇa jyāphalam kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6891_0: dvitīyapade yat utpannam punar yat gatam rāśyādikam atītam prathamapadasaṃjñitarāśitrayāt
GS41aryabhcu:6891_1: kṣayātmakāt dhanātmakam tat dvitīyapadasya yat gatam tat viśodhya śeṣam tatra kṣayaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate,
GS41aryabhcu:6892: tena tat utpannam phalam madhyamagrahe kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6893: evam dvitīyapadānte kṣayadhanayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiñcit avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:6895: saṃjātaḥ ã prathamapade gatajyāphalam kṣayaḥ, dvitīyapade api āgatajyāphalam kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6897: tat etat prathamapade gatam bhujāsaṃjñitam dvitīyapade anāgatam |
GS41aryabhcu:6901: caturthapade tṛtīyapadarāśitrayāt dhanāt dhanasaṃjñitāt caturthapadarāśyādigatakṣayasaṃjñitam viśodhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6903: caturthapadānte dhanakṣayayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6904: tasmāt atra api sa eva arthaḥ tulādikendre bhujāphalam dhanam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6906: yadi padeṣu sarveṣu tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ tadā evam syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6908: atulyeṣu ca paridhiṣu pratimaṇḍalasya ca api avasthā virudhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6912: grahaḥ tu gacchan krameṇa gacchati, na hariṇaplutena |
GS41aryabhcu:6915: nanu ca uktam ã na ca tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ paṭhyante
GS41aryabhcu:6918: evam vijñāyate ã ete paridhayaḥ upacayā[pacayā]tmakāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6922: tat yathā ã prathamapade kramajyām paridhyantareṇa hatvā vyāsārdhena labdham ūne viṣamapadaparidhau prakṣipyate, adhike apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6926: prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ dhanam, dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ kṣayaḥ iti viparyayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6927: athavā bhujāphalam śīghrakrameṇa ānītam meṣādau dhanam, tulādāvṛṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:6929: atra śīghraphalam vyāsārdhena saṃguṇayya tat utpannakrarṇena bhāgalabdham phalam dhanam ṛṇam vā |
GS41aryabhcu:6930: etat ca karma trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhamaṇḍale idam phalam
GS41aryabhcu:6932: tadā śīghroccakarṇamaṇḍale kiyat iti vyastatrairāśikena vyāsārdham guṇakāraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6935: ucyate ã “alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 14] iti anena |
GS41aryabhcu:6936: atha mandoccaphalam evam kasmāt na kriyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6937: ucyate ã kriyamāṇe api tāvat eva tat phalam bhavati iti na kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6939: tatra ca aviśeṣitena phalena vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāge hṛte pūrvam
GS41aryabhcu:6941: atha kim iti śīghroccakarṇaḥ na aviśiṣyate? abhāvāt aviśeṣakarmaṇaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6942: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya yathā svayojanakarṇaḥ vyāsārdhaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6944: pratimaṇḍalasya api etat eva vyāsārdham iti etat |
GS41aryabhcu:6946: atha manyate ã tatkālotpannabhujākoṭiniṣpannakarṇaḥ vyāsārdham pratimaṇḍalasya |
GS41aryabhcu:6950: atra ucyate ã caturthapadādau kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale tulye |
GS41aryabhcu:6953: evam krameṇa upacīyamānam uccatulyagrahe svoccavṛttaviṣkambhārdham upacitam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6954: tat eva prathamapadādau prabhṛti utkrameṇa apacīyamānam prathamapadānte vyāsārdham eva bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6955: evam krameṇa apacīyamānam dvitīyapadānte uccavṛttaviṣkambhārdham apacitam bhavati | tṛtīye
GS41aryabhcu:6956: [padānte] ca utkrameṇa upacīyamānam iti etat kakṣyāmaṇḍalavyāsārdham eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6957: grahasya uccanīcagatikramāt upacayāpacayātmakam bhavati iti ataḥ pratimaṇḍalasya upadeśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6958: ghanabhūmadhyāt eva grahasya uccanīcaparijñānam iti ataḥ vyāsārdham eva koṭiphalena upacīyate apacīyate vā |
GS41aryabhcu:6959: atha yadi pratimaṇḍalamadhyāt vyāsārdhasya vṛddhihrāsau syātām |
GS41aryabhcu:6964: śaniḥ ca guruḥ ca kujaḥ ca śanigurukujāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6965: ataḥ teṣu śanigurukujeṣu mandāt mandoccāt prabhṛti ya[t phalam upapadyate] tat ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6967: śīghrāt api ca yat phalam tat teṣu ardham kriyate prathame śīghrakarmaṇi |
GS41aryabhcu:6968: anyatra dvitīyakarmaṇi mandaśīghrayoḥ sakalaphalam iti arthāt avasīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6969: mandaśīghraphalāni kāṣṭhāni ṛṇam dhanam vā parikalpyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6972: tat phalam kva ṛṇam kva vā dhanam iti ã śanigurukujeṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:6976: yadi etat karma śanigurukujeṣu madhyameṣu kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6977: mandoccaphalārdhena madhyame ṛṇadhane kṛte tasya ṛṇadhanīkṛtasya madhyamatvam hīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6984: yathā devakattaḥ svalaṅkṛtaḥ api svam ākhyānam
GS41aryabhcu:6988: dve karmaṇī tatra tatra eva madhyame kriyete |
GS41aryabhcu:6989: athavā prathamamadhyamāt mandoccāyātam phalārdham madhyamotpannatvāt madhyame kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6990: yat punar śīghroccāyātam sakṛtsaṃskṛtāt phalārdham tat sakṛtsaṃskṛtāyātam eva iti kṛtvā sakṛtsaṃskṛtaḥ eva kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6991: tasmāt dvikarmasaṃsiddhāt mandoccaphalam tat sakalam eva madhyame grahe kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6993: atha idam praṣṭavyam ã yat etat dvikarmasiddhamandoccāyātam tat dvikarmasaṃsiddhe eva kasmāt na kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6994: ucyate ã ” mandoccāt sphuṭamadhyāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 23] iti madhyame kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6995: nanu ca dvikarmasiddhaḥ api madhyamaḥ eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6997: evam tarhi siddhe, punar sphuṭamadhyamagrahaṇam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati avikṛtamadhyaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7000: mandoccāyātam tat sakalam eva madhyame grahe kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7002: sa evaṃkṛte sphuṭamadhyamaḥ śīghroccakarmaṇā sphuṭaḥ bhavati iti sphuṭamadhyame śīghroccaphaladhanuḥ sakalam kriyate, sphuṭaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:7003: ṛṇadhanayuktipradarśanārtham vyāsārdhatulyena karkaṭakena samāyāmavanau samavṛttamaṇḍalam ālikhya mātṛpitṛrekhām kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7005: tanmaṇḍalakendrāt yāvatyaḥ abhīṣṭagrahāntyaphalaliptāḥ tāvati antare ca dakṣiṇena kendram kṛtvā vyāsārdhatulyena eva karkaṭakena tathā eva samavṛttamaṇḍalam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:7008: kakṣyāmaṇḍaladakṣiṇottararekhāsaṃpāte kendram kṛtvā ubhayatra vṛttadvayam ālikhya[te |
GS41aryabhcu:7010: tayoḥ yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale rāśijyāvikalpaḥ tathā karaṇīyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7011: prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt uparisthitatvāt pratimaṇḍalasya vyāsārdhe koṭisādhanam prakṣipya karṇaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7012: tāvat pramāṇam sūtram [pratimaṇḍalaparidhim] yatra spṛśati tatra sthāne sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7013: kakṣyāmaṇḍalajyā ca tasmāt purataḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7018: tāvatpramāṇam sūtram kakṣyāmaṇḍalamadhyāt pratimaṇḍalaparidhim yatra spṛśati tatra sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7020: tena tat utpannam phalam dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ madhyamagrahāt upacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7021: śīghrocce punar yeṣām kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ syuḥ mandoccāt evam eva śīghroccāt iti ayam pāṭhaḥ teṣām iyam ṛṇadhanopapattiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7022: yeṣām punar vyatyayena śīghroccāt iti ayam pāṭhaḥ teṣām iyam eva upapattiḥ viparītā |
GS41aryabhcu:7023: katham? pratimaṇḍale sphuṭaḥ ca grahaḥ, madhyamaḥ ca śīghroccaparikalpanāya kakṣyāmaṇḍale |
GS41aryabhcu:7024: punar kendrajyā tena prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitatvāt madhyamasya kendrajyāgrahasya ānīyamānasya kendrajyotpannam
GS41aryabhcu:7026: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitatvāt kendrajyāgrahasya tat phalam apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7029: tena yāvat bhūtārāgrahavivarapramāṇam sūtram kakṣyāmaṇḍalamadhyāt pratimaṇḍalaparidhim padavibhāgena prasāritam yatra spṛśati,
GS41aryabhcu:7031: anye punar anyathā paṭhanti ã śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrvam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7032: mande mandocce ardham phalasya ṛṇam dhanam,
GS41aryabhcu:7033: yadi tat grahe ṛṇam dhanam tadā tat mandocce dhanam ṛṇam iti arthāt avasīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7034: tatra kiyat tat phalam mandocce ṛṇam sat dhanam bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:7035: dhanam sat ṛṇam bhavati iti ucyate ã śīghroccaphalam yasmāt mandoccaphalam ca phaladvayam etat |
GS41aryabhcu:7040: karmacatuṣṭayagrahaṇāt tat utpannam ca phalam tatra eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7041: tat yathā ã prāg eva śīghraphalam ānīya tat ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā mandocce kṛtvā tat mandāyātam ca tena phaladvayasaṃskṛtena mandoccena saṃskṛtaḥ sa sphuṭamadhyaḥ grahaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:7042: sa śīghrakarmaṇā sphuṭaḥ iti prakriyāntaram etat || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7045: mandoccāt śīghroccāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam graheṣu mandeṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:7046: mandoccāt sphuṭamadhyāḥ śīghroccāt ca sphuṭāḥ jñeyāḥ || 23 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7047: mandoccāt yat phalam āyātam tasya cāpārdham ṛṇam dhanam vā graheṣu ṛṇam dhanam [mandeṣu vā kartavyam] |
GS41aryabhcu:7049: cakāreṇa vinā graheṣu mandeṣu ca iti cārthaḥ na labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7051: antareṇa api cakāram cārthaḥ avagamyate | [katham?] evam ã
GS41aryabhcu:7052: bāle vṛddhe kṣate kṣīṇe kṣīram yuktyā prayojayet |
GS41aryabhcu:7053: iti atra cakāreṇa vinā cārthasya avagamanāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7055: “sva“mandeṣu api vaktavyam, yena sveṣu madhyameṣu sveṣu ca mandeṣu kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7057: svasya grahasya yaḥ madhyamaḥ svasya ca yat mandam tatra eva karmasiddheḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7059: na ca tatra ucyate ã “svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7061: atha yat etat mandoccāyātam phalārdham tat kṣayadhanakrameṇa madhye grahe dhanam ṛṇam vā kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7062: mande punar katham kriyate, mandasya ṛṇadhanakramasya anabhidhānāt?
GS41aryabhcu:7063: ucyate ã mandoccam sarvadā eva grahasya ṛṇabhūtam |
GS41aryabhcu:7064: tatra yat grahasya ṛṇam tat mandocce prakṣipyate, ṛṇabhūtatvāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7065: yat grahe dhanabhūtam tat mandoccāt apanīyate, mandoccasya ṛṇabhūtatvāt eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7067: ṛṇa[ṛṇayoḥ dhana]dhanayoḥ saṃkṣepaḥ ṛṇadhanayoḥ ca viśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7069: tasmāt anena krameṇa mandocce phalārdhasya upacayāpacayau bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7070: śīghroccāt ca yat phalārdham tat api evam eva grahavaiparītyena mande dhanam ṛṇam vā kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7075: tena tādṛgvidhena mandena madhyamāt viśodhitena yat phalam āyātam tat sakalam madhyeṣu ṛṇam dhanam vā kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7078: na avikṛteṣu] madhyameṣu phalasya karaṇāt madhyamāḥJ|
GS41aryabhcu:7083: śīghroccāt āyātam phalam tena saṃskṛtāḥ sphuṭāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7088: śīghroccāt ardhonam kartavyam ṛṇam dhanam svamandocce |
GS41aryabhcu:7089: sphuṭamadhyau tu bhṛgubudhau siddhāt mandāt sphuṭau bhavataḥ || 24 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7090: śīghroccāt iti prāk śīghroccaniṣpannam phalam gṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7092: tatra tat ardhonam ardham iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7094: yadi grahe ṛṇam tadā dhanam kartavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7095: dhanasya ṛṇam kartavyam iti arthāt avasīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7100: yat eva śīghroccaphalārdhena saṃskṛtam mandoccam tat siddham
GS41aryabhcu:7103: etat uktam bhavati ã yat eta[t siddhamandam tat madhyama]grahāt viśodhya śeṣaphalasya ca ṛṇadhanena tayoḥ bhṛgubudhayoḥ madhyau sphuṭamadhyau bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7104: “tu“-śabdāt “śīghroccāt ca sphuṭāḥ jñeyāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 23] iti etat kriyate || 24 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7108: kakṣyāyām grahavegaḥ yaḥ bhavati sa mandanīcocce || 25 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7109: tārāgrahāṇām bhuvaḥ ca yat antaram tasya ānayanopāyaḥ ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7110: bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhuvaḥ tārāgrahasya ca yat antaram tat bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhavati iti vakṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:7115: etat uktam bhavati ã mandoccakarṇasya śīghroccakarṇasya ca yaḥ ghātaḥ saḥ svakarṇasaṃvargaḥ vyāsārdhahṛtaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7117: [kakṣyāyām] grahasya yaḥ mandaśīghroccaphalajanitaḥ vegaḥ sa tasya bhūtārāgrahavivarasya agre bhavati iti |
