GS41aryabhcu:7360: na atiricyate ã pratideśam akṣaviśeṣāt rāśīnām udayakālāḥ viṣamāḥ upalakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:7361: tena samaśabdāt ṛte viṣamapramāṇānām rāśīnām grahaṇam syāt,
GS41aryabhcu:7362: tataḥ ca akṣaviśeṣāt meṣādīnām apakramajyāḥ pratideśam bhinnapramāṇāḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7363: “sama“śabde punar kriyamāṇe tulyapramāṇarāśigrahaṇam siddham, yasmāt sarvaḥ eva
GS41aryabhcu:7364: rāśiḥ jyotiścakradvādaśabhāgaḥ, sa ca triṃśattriṃśadbhāgapramāṇaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7365: evam apakramamaṇḍalam viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa meṣādeḥ kanyāntam tiryak avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:7366: tat eva tulyādeḥ mīnāntam dakṣiṇena viṣuvataḥ tathā eva avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:7367: katham idam anuktam gamyate viṣuvataḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7369: udagdakṣiṇena iti b(r)uvan ācāryaḥ siddham eva viṣuvanmaṇḍalam pradarśayati |
GS41aryabhcu:7370: anyathā hi udagdakṣiṇena iti, etat anarthakam syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7373: ataḥ pūrvam viṣuvanmaṇḍalam badhvā tataḥ apakramamaṇḍalam badhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7374: sarvāṇi eva maṇḍalāni ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṅkitāni kriyante, yasmāt ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṃśam jyotiścakram || 1 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7376: tasmin ca apakramamaṇḍale ke bhramanti iti āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:7377: tārāgrahendupātāḥ bhramanti ajasram apamaṇḍale arkaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:7378: arkāt ca maṇḍalārdhe bhramati hi tasmin kṣiticchāyā || 2 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7382: arkaḥ ca na kevalam ete tārāgrahendupātāḥ apamaṇḍale bhramanti, arkaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:7383: tatra apamaṇḍale ajasram arkaḥ ca bhramati |
GS41aryabhcu:7384: arkāt ca maṇḍalārdhe arkāt punar maṇḍalārdhe ṣaḍrāśyantare,
GS41aryabhcu:7385: bhramati hi tasmin tatra maṇḍalārdhe, bhūcchāyā |
GS41aryabhcu:7386: yathā stambhādīnām pradīpavaśāt chāyā bhramati, evam bhuvaḥ api arkavaśāt,
GS41aryabhcu:7389: tat kim idānīm arkāt maṇḍalārdhe bhūcchāyā bhramati iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7390: na ca bhūcchāyāvyatiriktaḥ pātaḥ asti candramasaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7392: sarveṣām eva tārāgrahāṇām ye pātāḥ te apakramamaṇḍale bhramanti |
GS41aryabhcu:7393: candramasaḥ punar pātaḥ arkāt maṇḍalārdhe apakramamaṇḍale bhramati iti etat eva artham |
GS41aryabhcu:7394: “arkāt ca maṇḍalārdhe bhramati hi tasmin kṣiticchāyā” iti kathayati |
GS41aryabhcu:7395: nanu ca budhādīnām ye pātāḥ te niścalāḥ teṣām
GS41aryabhcu:7400: “tārāgrahendupātāḥ” iti iyam āryā kim artham ārabhyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7402: uktam ca “bhāpakramaḥ grahāṃśāḥ” [gītikāí, 8] iti sarve[ṣām gatimatā]m ete apakramabhāgāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7403: yadi ca gītikoktam api atra punar ucyate, tadā tarhi bahu atra abhidheyam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7404: athavā raveḥ cakrārdhe bhūcchāyā bhramati iti etat pradarśayitavyam syāt,
GS41aryabhcu:7408: raveḥ cakrārdhe bhūcchāyā bhramati iti etat pradarśayati,
GS41aryabhcu:7409: yataḥ hi śaṅkaḥ ṛjusthitasya pradīpasya tat ṛjupravṛttacchāyā |
GS41aryabhcu:7413: apamaṇḍalasya candraḥ pātāt yāti uttareṇa dakṣiṇataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7414: kujagurukoṇāḥ ca evam śīghroccena api budhaśukrau || 3 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7419: apamaṇḍalasaṃsthitaḥ vā candraḥ apamaṇḍalasya candraḥ, yathā ã kusūlasya vrīhayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7423: sa apamaṇḍalavyavasthitaḥ candraḥ pātāt yāti gacchati |
GS41aryabhcu:7426: tasya ca saṃyogasya pratikṣaṇam gatimattvāt, sā gatiḥ pātaśabdena abhidhīyate, upacārāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7427_0: ataḥ sa gatisaṃjñitaḥ pātaḥ yasmin rāśau yāvatithe bhāge vartate tasmin rāśau tāvatithe
GS41aryabhcu:7427_1: bhāge apakramamaṇḍalapramāṇam eva anyat maṇḍalam tasmin badhvā dvitīyam ardham cakrārdhāntare
GS41aryabhcu:7427_2: tathā eva badhnīyāt yathā tat apakramamaṇḍalāt uttareṇa avatiṣṭhate tasya [prathamam ardham],
GS41aryabhcu:7428: yathā dvitīyam ardham vā dakṣiṇena upalakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7432: ubhayatra cakracaturbhāgāntare yathā ardhapañcamāḥ bhāgāḥ tasya ca apakramamaṇḍalasya antare bhavanti tathā badhnīyāt vikṣepamaṇḍalam |
GS41aryabhcu:7434: viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā tat apakramamaṇḍalam |
GS41aryabhcu:7435: tasmāt apakramamaṇḍalāt uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā vikṣepamaṇḍalam pradarśayet |
GS41aryabhcu:7436_0: candrasya ca vikṣepamaṇḍalavyavasthitasya viṣuvataḥ ca antarānayane iyam yuktiḥ ã
GS41aryabhcu:7436_1: sphuṭacandramasaḥ bhujajyayā trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā bhujajyayā caturviṃśatyapakramabhāgajyā
GS41aryabhcu:7438: tataḥ pātāt apakramamaṇḍalavyavasthitaḥ candraḥ dakṣiṇena uttareṇa vā yāti iti uktavān |
GS41aryabhcu:7440: tatra viśeṣasya yā jyā tayā trairāśikam ã yadi
GS41aryabhcu:7441: vyāsārdhajyayā candravikṣepabhāgajyā labhyate anayā iṣṭajyayā kā iti, iṣṭavikṣepajyā labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7444: bhinnadikkayoḥ viśeṣaḥ, yasmāt ārāt apakramamaṇḍalā[t vikṣepamaṇḍalam] candraḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:7446: yogaviśleṣabhāgānām yā jyā tāvat antaram viṣuvataḥ candramasaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:7449: yathā candraḥ svasmāt pātāt uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā apakramamaṇḍalasthitaḥ yāti,
GS41aryabhcu:7457: [evam tarhi] etayoḥ apakramaparijñānam api śīghroccāt eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7459: apakramamaṇḍalāt pātāt vikṣepam bruvatā taduccayoḥ apakramamaṇḍalasthitiḥ pradarśitā bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:7461: samyak idam avagamyate ã etayoḥ apakramam api śīghroccāt iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7463: “śīghroccena api budhaśukrau” iti śīghroccāt pātapravṛttāt etayoḥ vikṣepaparijñānam ucyate, nāpamaparijñānam |
GS41aryabhcu:7464: ataḥ svataḥ e[va e]tayoḥ apakramānayanam śīghroccāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7465: evam api apakramamaṇḍalasthitau etau vikṣepamaṇḍale pratartate iti eta[t upapa]nnam eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7467: upāyāntareṇa vikṣiptam punar svataḥ eva apamaṇḍalāt pratiyakṣeṇa
GS41aryabhcu:7469: sarveṣām eva vikṣepaḥ apakramamaṇḍalāt uttareṇa dakṣiṇena ca |
GS41aryabhcu:7470: [pātāt] cakracaturbhāgāntare yathā uktāḥ [vikṣe]pabhāgāḥ vikṣepāpakramamaṇḍalayoḥ antare yathā avatiṣṭhante tathā pradarśyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7471: “apamaṇḍalasya candraḥ pātāt yāti” iti etat api gītikāsu upapadiṣṭa[pātānusāreṇa ava]dheyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7474: api budhaśukrau” iti e[tat api] vaktavyam | ataḥ avaśyam etat āryāsūtram vaktavyam || 3 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7477: candraḥ aṃśaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ avikṣiptaḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ dṛśyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7478: navabhiḥ bhṛguḥ bhṛgoḥ taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ yathā ślakṣṇāḥ ||4||
GS41aryabhcu:7481: tena “sāmānyacodanāḥ ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhante” iti aṃśaviśeṣeṣu avasthāpyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7487: tataḥ prāṇānām saptaśatasya viṃśatyadhikasya [720] dvādaśa bhāgāḥ, ghaṭikādvayam iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7490: athavā sūryāt paścāt prāk vā kālena antaritaḥ grahaḥ yasmāt [dṛśyaḥ tasmāt] kālāṃśatvam |
GS41aryabhcu:7497: yadā punar asau vikṣiptaḥ ghaṭikādvayāt ūnādhike kāle dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7498: yasmāt arkāt uttareṇa vikṣiptaḥ candraḥ golasya uttaronnatatvāt ūne api ghaṭikādvaye kāle dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7499: dakṣiṇavikṣiptaḥ ca unnatatvāt golasya dakṣiṇena ghaṭikādvayādhikakāle dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7503: tathā eva kālabhāgaiḥ navabhiḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ avikṣiptaḥ bhṛguḥ dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7504: navabhiḥ kālabhāgaiḥ vikṣiptasya vikṣepakarma candravat eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7507: navabhiḥ bhṛguḥ taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ iti etāvatā siddhe punar bhṛgugrahaṇam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati ã bhṛgoḥ iyam kāṣṭhabhāgāḥ nava iti,
GS41aryabhcu:7509: anyathā hi ayam bhṛguḥ ataḥ nyūneṣu api triṣu
GS41aryabhcu:7510: caturṣu vā antaritaḥ vakrakāle udayāstamayau kurvan lakṣyate iti etat punar bhṛgugrahaṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:7511: taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ iti vīpsāgrahaṇam ca bhāgadvayāntaragrahaṇārtham |
GS41aryabhcu:7512: anyathā hi sarveṣām eva nava eva bhāgāḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7514: ete grahāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ parihīyamānaśarīrāḥ pratipāditāḥ tathā dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ arkāntarasthitāḥ avikṣiptāḥ santaḥ dṛśyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7518: bhṛgoḥ bhāgaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dṛśyate ṣaḍbhāgonaghaṭikādvayena,
GS41aryabhcu:7519: taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ bṛhaspateḥ trayodaśabhiḥ ṣaḍbhāgottaraghaṭikādvayena budhaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7522: etāvadbhiḥ kālabhāgaiḥ antaritāḥ dṛśyante iti uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:7523: adarśanam punar eṣām katham avagamyate? kecit tāvat āhuḥ ã etāvadbhiḥ eva bhāgaiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7526: katham etāvadbhiḥ eva bāgaiḥ dṛśyaḥ adṛśyaḥ ca?
GS41aryabhcu:7527: yadā arkāt niṣkrāmati grahaḥ tadā tāvadbhiḥ eva dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7528: yadā sa eva arkam praviśati tadā [tāvadbhi]ḥ eva antaritaḥ na dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7529: etat ca [na] ã yāvatā niṣkrāmataḥ praviśataḥ vā grahasya tulyam idam antaram,
GS41aryabhcu:7530: tena dṛśyena vā graheṇa bhavitavyam adṛśyena vā |
GS41aryabhcu:7531: sa tāvat iṣṭakālāṃśakaiḥ dṛśyaḥ eva upalabhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7534: eva bhāgaiḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ niṣkrāmat praviśat vā dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7535: ūnaiḥ ataḥ dṛśyate iti arthāt avagamyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7536: adhikaiḥ punar nitarām dṛśyate iti etat aśāstrajñaḥ api jānāti |
GS41aryabhcu:7538: tat yathā ã yadi triṃśatā svadeśarāśyudayakālaḥ labhyate tadā idānīm niṣpannārkagrahāntarabhāgaiḥ kaḥ iti, kālaḥ labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7539: sa yadi abhīṣṭagrahāntarakālena tulyaḥ tadā asau grahaḥ dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7542: athavā svadeśarāśyudayena triṃśatā ca trairāśikam kṛtvā sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgānayanam ã yadi rāśyudayakālena triṃśadbhāgāḥ labhyante
GS41aryabhcu:7543: tadā iṣṭagrahāntarābhihitakālena kiyantaḥ iti sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgāḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7544: taiḥ vā sakṛtsiddhaiḥ eva antarabhāgaiḥ iṣṭadeśe grahasya darśanam vaktavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7547: yasmāt udayarāśivaśāt eva astam rāśayaḥ gacchanti || 4 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7555: bhūḥ ca grahāḥ ca bhāni ca bhūgrahabhāni, teṣām bhūgrahabhānām |
GS41aryabhcu:7558: ataḥ teṣām golānām ardhāni golākāraśarīrārdhāni iti yāvat |
GS41aryabhcu:7560: bhuvam tāvat anye śakaṭākārām darpaṇavṛttākārām ca manyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7562: yathā golākārā bhūḥ pratipadyate tathā uttarataḥ vakṣyāmi |
GS41aryabhcu:7563: katham punar atra amī grahāḥ golākārāḥ pratipadyante?
GS41aryabhcu:7564: atha ca darpaṇavṛttākārau sūryācandramasau lakṣyete, evam anye api |
GS41aryabhcu:7565: anyat ca ã sthityardhādiparilekhanaprakriyā ca golākāraśarīreṣu na ghaṭate |
GS41aryabhcu:7570: tasyāḥ dṛgviṣayatvāt yathādarśanagatāni eva bimbasaṃsthānāni aṅgīkṛtya ācāryeṇa uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:7571: athavā golākāreṣu api sthityardhādyupapattiḥ śakyate vaktum |
GS41aryabhcu:7572_0: yasmāt vikṣepādayaḥ bimbamadhyāt pravṛttāḥ tāvat jñātvā golakānām bimbārdham darpaṇavṛttākāraḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7572_1: iva yathā bhraman niṣpāditaḥ samudgataḥ tasyāḥ udaram darpaṇavṛttākāram eva upalakṣyate, tasmāt golākārāt
GS41aryabhcu:7575: anyathā hi candramasaḥ sitakṣayavṛddhī darpaṇavṛttākāre bimbe na saṃvadete |
GS41aryabhcu:7576: tasmāt golākāraśarīrāḥ ete | uktam ca ã
GS41aryabhcu:7577: sūryaḥ agnimayaḥ golaḥ candraḥ ambumayaḥ svabhāvataḥ svacchaḥ | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7580: tayā svacchāyayā ardhāni eṣām [vivarṇāni aprakāśātmakāni kṛṣṇāni iti arthaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7582: yathā ghaṭasya ātapasthasya ekam pārśvam svacchāyayā eva vivarṇam, evam atra api |
GS41aryabhcu:7585: teṣām golānām ardhāni, yāvanti avaśiṣṭāni svacchāyāvaivarṇyāni vyatiriktāni |
GS41aryabhcu:7590: yadi ardhāni grahāṇām sūryābhimukhāni cakāsanti tadā kim iti candramasaḥ ardhabimbam sarvadā na cakāsti? cakāsti eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7592: ucyate ã amāvāsyāyām candramasaḥ upari ādityaḥ tadā tasya candramasaḥ upari yat bimbārdham tat aśeṣam avabhāsayati |
GS41aryabhcu:7593: candrasya amāvāsyopalakṣitoparibimbakendrāt yathā yathā paścāt ādityaḥ avalambate tathā tathā bimbakendram api aparataḥ avalambate |
GS41aryabhcu:7595: eva amāvāsyopalakṣitam bimbaparidhyardhāvadheḥ avalambate tāvat candramasaḥ bimbam asmābhiḥ upalakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7597: sūryābhimukham api savitṛkarā[t chāditam api na dṛśyate] |
GS41aryabhcu:7598: tasmāt yāvat yāvat candramasaḥ bimbam savitṛbimbāt ślakṣṇam avalambate tāvān svacchaḥ candramasaḥ śuklaḥ upalakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7600: tena tarhi savitṛmarīcayaḥ tu sa[lila]maye svabhāvāt eva [svaccha]candrabimbe
GS41aryabhcu:7602: yathā darpaṇe jale vā divasakarāḥ sammūrcchitāḥ santaḥ gṛhāntargatam tamaḥ kṣapayanti |
GS41aryabhcu:7604: anyat ca ã yaḥ yaḥ candrabimbapradeśāḥ savitṛmārge ṛjutvena vyavasthitaḥ sa eva śṛṅgonnatau upalabhyate, na itaraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7605: tathā ca tat jijñāsavaḥ karma kurvanti |
GS41aryabhcu:7606: tat yathā ã śuklapratipadādiṣu sūryārdhāstamayakālikau sūryācandramasau kṛtvā sūryonacandrotkramajyā gṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7607: sā yasmāt pratidivasam upacīyamānā, candramasaḥ śuklam upacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7609: tena tayā utkramajyayā trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā utkramajyayā
GS41aryabhcu:7610: sphuṭacandrabimbārdham upalabhyate, tadā anayā utkramajyayā kiyat iti, tat kālasitamānam labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7611: śuklāṣṭamyāḥ parataḥ yā sitavṛddhiḥ sā kramajyāvaśāt upacīyamānā lakṣyate iti kramajyā gṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7612: tāḥ kramajyāḥ pūrvopacitavyāsārdhajyāsu prakṣipya trairāśikam kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7613: athavā ã tābhiḥ eva kramajyābhiḥ candrabimbārdhena trairāśikam kṛtvā yat labdham candrabimbārdhe prakṣiptam sitamānam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:7616: tena sūryācandramasoḥ viśeṣāt rāśiṣaṭkam apanīya tathā eva karma kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7618: darśanakālaḥ hi yāvantam kālam candraḥ dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7619_0: yavatā kālena udeti tat ānayanopāyaḥ ã śuklapakṣe tāvat udayarāśivaśāt eva jyotiścakragatiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7619_1: iti ataḥ yāvantaḥ sūryāt candrarāśibhāgāḥ tāvantaḥ eva udayāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ parigṛhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7620: tat yathā ã āstamayike savitari ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipyante sa sūryāt saptamaḥ rāśiḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:7621: tathā ca candramasi ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipya sūryagatarāśibhāgān triṃśatā viśodhayet śeṣam sūryasya āgatarāśibhāgaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7622: | tat ṣaḍrāśiyutasūryavartamānarāśyudayena saṅguṇayya triṃśatā vibhajet, labdham prāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7624: sūryāgatarāśibhāgān ca ṣaḍrāśiyutasūrye prakṣipya tāvat svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7625: tataḥ ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ tat rāśyudayaprāṇaiḥ saṅguṇya triṃśatā vibhajet, labdham prāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7626: tān pūrvasaṅkalitaprāṇān ca sarvān ekatra nyastaprāṇeṣu prakṣipya ṣaḍbhiḥ bhāgaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7630: tāvatā kālena sūryācandramasoḥ gativiśeṣaḥ asti iti aviśeṣakarma pravartate |
GS41aryabhcu:7631: tat yathā ã yadi ṣaṣṭyā ghaṭikābhiḥ sūryabhuktiḥ candrabhuktiḥ vā labhyate tataḥ anena darśanakālena te kiyatyau tayoḥ bhuktī iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7633: candrabhuktilabdham api ṣaḍrāśiyutacandramasi prakṣipya tāvat idam kuryāt yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7634: tatra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ kālaḥ sa darśanakālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7637: yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tasmāt cakrārdham apanayet tāvān candraḥ darśanakālaparisamāptau astam eti |
GS41aryabhcu:7638: atha kaścit yadi kiyatā kālena a[na]stamite savitari candrodayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7640: tat yathā ã avikṛtāstamayakālādityabhāgebhyaḥ prabhṛti tāvat prāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat avikṛtaśītāṃśoḥ gatabhāgaprāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7644: atra api sūryācandramasoḥ aviśeṣakarma pravartate | tat yathā ã āsām
GS41aryabhcu:7645: nāḍīnām yaḥ yaḥ bhogaḥ tena adhikau sūryācandramasau iti ataḥ tābhyām apanīya apanīya aviśeṣaḥ kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7646: aviśeṣitaḥ darśanakālaḥ tāvatā kālena divasaśeṣaḥ eva candrodayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7647: yaḥ asau aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ tāvān tatra divasaśeṣodayakāle candraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7648: athavā prathamānītadivasaśeṣacandrodayakālena candramasaḥ bhuktim saṅguṇayya ṣaṣṭyā vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:7652: tat udayalagnam tena divasaśeṣoditacandreṇa tulyam yadā, tadā divasaśeṣam candrodayakālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7653: atha yadi tasmāt lagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā prathamataram uditaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7656: teṣām ca prāṇānām yāvatī candrabhuktiḥ trairāśikena labhyate tāvatī prathamadivasaśeṣoditakālacandrāt viśodhyate tāvān candraḥ divasaśeṣoditaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7658: candraḥ ca yadā adhikaḥ tadā pūrvavat tadantaraprāṇān divasaśeṣakāle prakṣipet tāvatām prāṇānām candrabhogam candramasi prakṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:7660: athavā prathamāstamayikacandrāt eva antarotpannadivasaśeṣakālabhogaḥ candramasaḥ viśodhya tat kālalagnakrameṇa
GS41aryabhcu:7662: atha yadi udayalagnāt candraḥ adhikaḥ tadā [kiyan]nāḍyā abhyudeti candraḥ iti tadantaraprāṇān prathamānītadivasaśeṣe prakṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:7663: tat bhuktim candramasi prakṣipet tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7664: evam udayalagnam candraḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhavati, divasaśeṣacandrodayakālaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:7666: paurṇamāsyām punar tāvat eva antaraghaṭikāḥ yadi dinapramāṇaghaṭikābhyaḥ ūnāḥ bhaveyuḥ tadā anastamite āditye candrodayaḥ, yadi atiriktāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7668: ubhayatra api antarakālapramāṇena aviśeṣakarma anantarakarmavat eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7669_1: śeṣa[ghaṭikā]bhiḥ bhukiḥ trairāśikena sūryācandramasau sañcārya punar tayoḥ antaraghaṭikābhyaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7670: śeṣaghaṭikābhiḥ candrādityau tadantarālaghaṭikāḥ iti ādyaviśeṣāntam karma kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7671: tatra aviśiṣṭena kālena [sūryāstamayāt paścāt candrodayaḥ | evam
GS41aryabhcu:7672: eva aviśiṣṭena kālena] sūryodayāt prāk candrodayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7673: atha anastamite savitari kiyatā kālena candraḥ astam yāsyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ idam karma kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7674: tat yathā ã sūryodayakālotpannam candramasam kṛtvā tatra rāśiṣaṭkam prakṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:7676: atha audayikāt ādityāt ṣaḍrāśiyuktaniśākarāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayavidhānena yāvatyaḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāḥ aviśeṣyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7678: tāsām trairāśikena yāvat candramasaḥ bhuktiḥ tām candramasi prakṣipet iti ataḥ punar api tasmāt ādityāt
GS41aryabhcu:7679: ṣaḍrāśiyuktacandrāvadheḥ pūrvavat ghaṭikāḥ tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7680: tatra yāḥ aviśeṣitāḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāvatībhiḥ divase vyatītābhiḥ candraḥ astam eti |
GS41aryabhcu:7682: atra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle tāvān,
GS41aryabhcu:7683: yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle udayalagnam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7685: atha kaścit kiyatā kālena śuklāṣṭamyā parataḥ candraḥ gaganamadhyam avagāhate,
GS41aryabhcu:7686: kiyān vā tatra candraḥ iti jijñāsuḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7688: atha tatkālāt parataḥ svadhiyā āsannau madhyalagnaniśākarau abhyūhya,
GS41aryabhcu:7689: tatra yadi madhyalagnaniśākarau tulyau syātām tadā tāvān candraḥ tāvatā eva kālena gaganamadhyam ārokṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:7690: atha yadi adhikaḥ candraḥ tadā na adya api prāpnoti gaganamadhyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7692: prakṣipya madhyalagnacandrau kuryāt yāvat tulyau iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7693: atha madhyalagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā tadantarālakālam svadhiyā abhyūhita[kālāt viśodhya] madhyalagnacandrau tāvat kuryāt yāvat madhyalagnacandrau tulyau syātām |
GS41aryabhcu:7699: sa ca antarālataḥ sūryāgrayā saha ekadikkam viśeṣyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7700: yataḥ arkāt eva uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā candraḥ sādhyate, na viṣuvataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7703: evam pariniṣṭhitapramāṇam bhujā sūryāt yāmya uttarāyatā prasāryate |
GS41aryabhcu:7705: uttareṇa candraḥ tadā bhujottarāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā prasāryate |
GS41aryabhcu:7706: yadā dakṣiṇena candraḥ sūryāt tadā tasyāḥ bhujāyāḥ dakṣiṇāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā |
GS41aryabhcu:7707: evam bhujakoṭī yathāgatapramāṇena vinyasya bhujākoṭimastakāvagāhī karṇaḥ dūranirgatāgraḥ prasārya koṭyagrakarṇasampāte kendram viracya candrabimbam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:7708: tasya candrabimbaparidheḥ aparataḥ karṇānusāreṇa sitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7712: tataḥ tābhyām pūrvavihitabindunā ca tathā chedyakavidhānena tat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:7713: tasya vṛttasya candrabimbaparidheḥ ca yat antaram tat candramasaḥ śuklaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7716: candrodayalagnāntaraprāṇotpannaḥ śaṅkuḥ, koṭiḥ aparābhimukhī tathā eva prasāryate |
GS41aryabhcu:7717: tatra yathāgatam sitamānam candrabimbapramāṇāt viśodhyam śeṣam asitam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:7718: tatkarṇānusāreṇa candraparidhipūrvabhāgāt bimbāntare asitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7719: tena dakṣiṇottarabindubhyām ca pūrvavat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:7722: kṛṣṇapratipadādiṣu ca aparābhimukhaprasāritakoṭikarṇāgralikhitacandraparidhyaparabhāgāt karṇānusāreṇa asitam antaḥ pūrvavat vṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:7723: iṣṭakāle tu yathā pratyāsannāstodayalagnajyām arkāgrām parikalpya tatkālacandraśaṅkvagram āpādya iṣṭalagnacandrāntaraprāṇotpannaśaṅkukoṭyā candraḥ parilekhanīyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7724: evam sarvatra kṣitijāt upari vyavasthitasya candrasya parilekhanaprakriyā |
GS41aryabhcu:7727: tat yathā ã samyak prasiddhagṛhodare pūrvāpararekhātaḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā parikalpitāṅgulapramāṇam arkāgrāsūtram pūrvavat prasārya bindum kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7729: pūrvāpararekhāyāḥ eva dakṣiṇottarataḥ candrāgrataḥ śaṅkvagrayoḥ yogaviśeṣajyāṅgulatulyam sūtram yathā āgatadiśam prasārya bindum kuryāt
GS41aryabhcu:7734: tatra śaṅkvagrāyatadaṇḍaśirasi yathālikhitam tat chedyakasitaśṛṅgonnatim arkabindunyastadṛṣṭiḥ karṇānusāreṇa utkṣiptāvalambakāṅgulapramāṇamastakāsaktam śaśalakṣmāṇam paśyati |
GS41aryabhcu:7735: evam eva grahāḥ api gṛhodaravyavasthitaiḥ darśanīyāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7737: kṣitijamaṇḍalākrāntārdhabimbasya candramasaḥ koṭeḥ abhāvāt na parilikhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7739: tat yathā ã yadi candrāgrā dakṣiṇena udayajyā uttareṇa tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7741: bhavṛttacandrānusāreṇa ca sūryamarīcayaḥ candrabimbam karṇagatyā avagāhante |
GS41aryabhcu:7742: yadā punar candrāgrā uttareṇa udayajyā dakṣiṇena tadā candramasaḥ dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam
GS41aryabhcu:7747: candrāgrā yadā atiricyate tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate, anyathā dakṣiṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:7748: uttareṇa yadā candrāgrā atiricyate tadā dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate, anyathā uttaram |
GS41aryabhcu:7749: yadā punar viśeṣeṇa na kiñcit antaram tadā yugapat ubhayaśṛṅgadarśanam |
GS41aryabhcu:7750: yadā ca udayajyā candrāgre na bhavataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7751: tadā ca astamaye candramasaḥ astalagnajyayā candrāgrayā ca śṛṅgasya prāk paścāt vā astamayam parikalpanīyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7753: evam candramasaḥ sitāsitaśṛṅgonnatidarśanakālādayaḥ savitṛvaśāt eva | evam ca nirukte paṭhyate ã
GS41aryabhcu:7754: tasya ekau raśmiḥ candramasam prati dīpyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7755: na hi tena upekṣitavyam | ādityataḥ asya dīptiḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:7758: iti api ca nigamaḥ bhavati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7759: tasmāt etena eva liṅgena candramārgāt upari sūryamārgaḥ iti, anyathā anupapatyā |
GS41aryabhcu:7760: pariśiṣṭāḥ ca tārāgrahāḥ sūryamārgāt upari dūreṇa vyavasthitāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7761: tena teṣām ārātsthitāni golārdhāni sarvadā sakalāni eva cakāsate |
GS41aryabhcu:7762: ūrdhvamukhāḥ sūryamarīcayaḥ sadā ārādbhāgam prakāśayanti iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7763: budhaśukrayoḥ ca pratyāsannavartitvāt sarvataḥ bimbam avagāhante arkamarīcayaḥ pradīpapratyāsannagolavat tena tayoḥ api asakalabimbatābhāvaḥ | yadi
GS41aryabhcu:7764: evam astamite savitari katham ete grahādayaḥ cakāsate savitṛkarābhāvāt ? na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7766: tena uparimukhānām sūryamarīcīnām na vyavadhānāya bhūḥ vartate |
GS41aryabhcu:7767: yathā ghaṭasya upari adhaḥ dūreṇa avasthitasya pradīpasya ghaṭaḥ na vyavadhānakāraṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:7768: kṛṣṇapakṣapratipadādiṣu candramasaḥ bimbapūrvabhāgaḥ pratyāsannaḥ savituḥ iti tena tat śuklam upalabhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7769: ratnānām ca ādityakarāḥ eva dīptikāraṇatvam prapadyate | tena tāni
GS41aryabhcu:7770: api rātrau na prakāśātmakāni | uktam ca ratnaparīkṣāyām ã
GS41aryabhcu:7771: bhānoḥ ca bhāsām anuvedhayogam āsādya raśmiprakareṇa dūram |
GS41aryabhcu:7772: pārśvāṇi sarvāṇi anurañjayanti guṇaiḥ upetāḥ sphaṭik[ādayaḥ hi] ||
GS41aryabhcu:7773: [yat] upākhyānādiṣu ratnāni eva dhvāntam dhvaṃsayanti iti śrūyate tat upākhyāna[m arthavādamātra]m eva |
GS41aryabhcu:7778: tasya śuklasya candramasaḥ savitṛsannikarṣāt vaivarṇyam bhavati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7780: yadi svabhāvataḥ śuklasya candramasaḥ sūryasannikarṣāt vaivarṇyam syāt tadā śuklapratipadādiṣu candrasya aparabhāgaḥ vivarṇaḥ syāt sūryasannikarṣāt, na pūrvabhāgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7782: tasmāt mithyājñānam eva etat yat saugataiḥ ucyate || 5 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7789: yasmāt [bhāni] samantataḥ viyati pañjarasthāni iva lakṣyante tataḥ anena darśanena etat uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:7790: vṛttaḥ ca asau bhapañjaraḥ ca vṛttabhapañjaraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7794: khamadhyagataḥ, kham ākāśam, tasya madhyam khamadhyam, khamadhyaṃgataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7798: na teṣām anyaḥ asti kaścit kledadahanapreraṇaprayojakaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7801: athavā patantī bhūḥ, “patatu adhaḥ” iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:7803: yathā asmadīyānām pṛthivī adhaḥ, evam pṛthivyāḥ kim adhaḥ? “adhaḥ“-śabdaḥ ca digvācī,
GS41aryabhcu:7805: yathā yatra vivasvān udeti sā prācī,
GS41aryabhcu:7807: yasyām adṛśyaḥ gacchati sā uttarā, śeṣā dakṣiṇā |
GS41aryabhcu:7809: evam upari adhaḥ ca pṛthivī apekṣayā bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7810: tena tasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ na kiñcit upari, na adhaḥ, tasmāt patanābhāvaḥ bhuvaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7811: evam ca pṛthivyāḥ ardham pariveṣṭyā avasthitaḥ samudraḥ na patiti |
GS41aryabhcu:7812: patantyām ca bhuvi loṣṭaśilīmukhādayaḥ viyati kṣiptā na bhuvam āsādayeyuḥ | bhūḥ mandam
GS41aryabhcu:7813: patati iti cet, sādhyate ca etat māyāvidbhiḥ ca, viyati khātakīlakaḥ anāśrayaḥ bhavet |
GS41aryabhcu:7814: atha anye manyante ã śeṣeṇa anyena [vā] bhūḥ dhriyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7816: śeṣādīnām api avaśyam ādhāraviśeṣaḥ kaścit kalpanīyaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7817: [taya anyaḥ ā]dhāraḥ syā[t tasya api anyaḥ] iti anavasthā |
GS41aryabhcu:7818: atha te svaśaktyā eva avatiṣṭhante iti cet, bhuvaḥ eva kasmāt sā śaktiḥ na parikalpyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7819: tasmāt jagataḥ dharmādharmāpekṣayā sarvabhūtadhātrī bhūḥ niścalā ākāśe tiṣṭhati |
GS41aryabhcu:7823: mṛdādinā kāṣṭhādinā vā ayaḥśalākāyām madhye samavṛttavat avagantavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7828: tadvat hi sarvasattvaiḥ jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca bhūgolaḥ || 7 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7831: tathā ayam bhūgolaḥ samantāt jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca prāṇibhiḥ āvṛttaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7832: atha ye bhuvi vyavasthitāḥ prāṇinaḥ parvatādayaḥ teṣām katham avasthānam tat ucyate ã yatra yatra prāṇinaḥ gacchanti tatra tatra teṣām bhūḥ eva adhaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7839: ataḥ eva gṛhapādapataḍāgādikhāteṣu ghaṭapiṭakādi upari upari avayavāḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7842: mṛdā upacitā mṛdupacitā, tasyāḥ mṛdupacitāyāḥ hāniḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:7843: kena punar kāraṇena yat upacitam buvaḥ tat parikṣīyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7844: brahmadivasāvasāne kila saṃvartakābhidhānaiḥ jaladharaiḥ vicchinnadhārābhimuktena payasā yat upacitam bhuvaḥ tat parikṣīyate || 8 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7847: anulomagatiḥ nausthaḥ paśyati acalam vilomagam yadvat |
GS41aryabhcu:7854: [tathā eva] ca bhūmau prāṅmukham bhramatyām upari[sthitāḥ janāḥ] nabhasthitāni acalāni bhāni pratilomagāni aparagāni paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:7855: tathā hi laṅkāsthāḥ bhāni samapaścimagāni paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:7858: tasmāt iyam bhūḥ eva prāṅmukham bhramati
GS41aryabhcu:7860: bhūgatyā taduparisthitaḥ yaḥ bhacakrapradeśaḥ purastāt sa udayan iva ca lakṣyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7861: yaḥ tu madhye sa gaganamadhyasthitaḥ iva,
GS41aryabhcu:7862: yaḥ hi dūreṇa saḥ astam gacchan iva lakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7863: anyathā hi niścalasya bhacakrasya udayāstāsambhavaḥ syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7867: pakṣiṇaḥ api viyati utpatan na svanīḍam āsādayeyuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7868: tasmāt dharitrībhramaṇe na kiñcit liṅgam asti |
GS41aryabhcu:7870: yathā anulomagatiḥ nausthaḥ puruṣaḥ calavastūni vilomagam paśyati,
GS41aryabhcu:7871: evam bhāni calāni pravahānilākṣiptāni vegavaśāt laṅkāyām yāni vastūni tāni pratilomagāni
GS41aryabhcu:7872: paśyanti; adhovyavasthitām bhuvam niścalām bhramantīm iva paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:7873: pratyakṣe api nakṣatrāṇi prāguditāni aparām diśam āsādayanti || 9 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7879: tayoḥ ] udayāstamayayoḥ nimittam nityam pravaheṇa pravahasaṃjñitena vāyunā kṣiptaḥ bhapañjaraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7881: laṅkāyām samapaścimaḥ yaḥ dikpradeśaḥ sa laṅkāsamapaścimaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7885: yadi api grahāḥ prāṅmukham vrajanti tathā api bhapañjarāpekṣayā aparadiksaṅkramaṇam kurvanti,
GS41aryabhcu:7892: yojanam mātrā yasya sa yojanamātraḥ, pramāṇe mātranpratyayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7895: [nandanavanasya madhye], nandanam vanam [devānām apsarogaṇaparivṛtānām] krīḍāsthānam, tasya madhye |
GS41aryabhcu:7900: atha paurāṇikaiḥ lakṣayojanapramāṇaḥ meruḥ paṭhyate tat yuktirahitam |
GS41aryabhcu:7901: [laṅkātaḥ yāvat merumadhyam tāvat yojanasahasram api na asti, kutaḥ tat ekadeśe bhaviṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:7902: atha bhūḥ eva mahāpramāṇā parikalpyate, tat ayuktam |
GS41aryabhcu:7903: ] yat sapañcāśatsahasram yojanānām bhūvyāsāmanam akṣonnatiprasādhitam tat sopapattikam |
GS41aryabhcu:7905: kim ca purāṇeṣu puṣkaradvīpasya uparigataḥ vivasvān madhyāhnam karoti iti paṭhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7910: tatra yadi madhyāhnaḥ vivasvataḥ syāt asmākam uttaragolabhūtatvāt śaṅkoḥ chāyānāśaḥ [na] syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7912: tasmāt viṣuvati laṅkāmadhye savitā gacchati iti siddham |
GS41aryabhcu:7914: na savitā gacchati iti taiḥ eva uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:7916: yadi pataṅgavat utplutya gacchati tataḥ yujyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7918: ] tasmāt dhruvonnatyā [ānītam eva] bhuvaḥ pramāṇam siddham |
GS41aryabhcu:7919: tatra mahāpramāṇasya meroḥ avasthānam eva na asti |
GS41aryabhcu:7920: [yadi kathañcit mahāpramāṇaḥ eva meruḥ avatiṣṭhate tadā sa kim asmābhiḥ na dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7921: ] dūratvāt meruḥ asmābhiḥ na dṛśyate, athavā niṣprabhatvāt tat na dṛśyate, na tarhi ratnamayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7922: kim ca yadi mahāpramāṇaḥ meruḥ syāt meruśikharāntaritatvāt bhāvāt uttareṇa tārakāḥ na dṛśyeran |
GS41aryabhcu:7923: tasmāt tasya kanakagireḥ upariśikharapradeśe eva sarvaratnamayaḥ meruśabdena ucyate || 11 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7925: kva bhūpradeśe meruḥ, kva vā baḍavāmukham iti āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:7926: svaḥ merū sthalamadhye narakaḥ baḍavāmukham ca jalamadhye |
GS41aryabhcu:7930: amaramarāḥ amarāḥ devāḥ, marāḥ narakasthāḥ, te parasparam adhaḥsthāḥ manyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7931: yataḥ sarveṣām bhūḥ adhaḥ, ataḥ anyonyam adhaḥsthitāḥ manyante |
GS41aryabhcu:7932: yatra uttareṇa ayaḥśalākā bhuvam bhitvā nirgatā tatra pradeśe svargaḥ meruḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7933: yatra dakṣiṇena nirgatā tatra narakaḥ baḍavāmukham ca || 12 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7936: udayaḥ yaḥ laṅkāyām saḥ astamayaḥ savituḥ eva siddhapure |
GS41aryabhcu:7938: laṅkānivāsinām yaḥ udayaḥ sa eva siddhapuranivāsinām astamayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7941: yaḥ eva laṅkāpuranivāsinām udayaḥ sa eva yamakoṭinivāsinām madhyāhnaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7943: yaḥ laṅkānivāsinām udayaḥ sa romakanivāsinām ardharātraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7951: sthalamadhyāt meroḥ ārabhya jalamadhyāt ca baḍavāmukhāt laṅkā bhūkakṣyāyāḥ caturthabhāge vyavasthitā | bhūparidhiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7968: pūrvabhāgavyavasthitāḥ prathamataram eva ravim paśyanti, ataḥ deśāntaraphalam apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7969: paścimabhāge [vyavasthitāḥ] cireṇa paśyanti, ataḥ tatra deśāntaraphalam kṣipyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7970: svadeśākṣasamarekhākṣavivarabhāgaiḥ trairāśikam ã yadi cakrāṃśakaiḥ bhūparidhiyojanāni labhyante
GS41aryabhcu:7974: tadā akṣāṃśāvivarabhāgaiḥ kim iti, samadakṣiṇottararekhāntarālayojanāni bhavanti koṭyātmakāni |
GS41aryabhcu:7978: tataḥ yadi vyāsārdhatulyāvalaṃbake[na bhūparidhiḥ tadā iṣṭāvalaṃbakena kā iti, spaṣṭabhūparidhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:7979: punar yadi] spaṣṭabhūparidhinā grahabhuktiḥ labhyate deśāntarayojanaiḥ kā bhuktiḥ iti deśāntarphalam labhyate | pūrvavat
GS41aryabhcu:7983: bhūvyāsārdhena ūnam dṛśyam deśāt samāt bhagolārdham |
GS41aryabhcu:7985: bhuvaḥ vyāsaḥ bhūvyāsaḥ tasya ardham bhūvyāsārdham, 525 |
GS41aryabhcu:7988: anantaritaḥ samaḥ, mahādridrumādyunnatapadārtharahitaḥ deśaḥ samaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:7989: ardham bhūmicchannam na dṛśyate bhūvyāsārdhena adhikam adṛśyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7990: etat jijñāsuḥ bhūgolapṛṣṭhāvagāhi sūtram prasārya pūrvakṣitije aparakṣitije [ca] badhnīyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:7992: tatra [pūrva]pradeśe jyotīṃṣi ardhoditāni paśyati, paścāt ardhāstamitāni [paścati] |
GS41aryabhcu:7994: yat etat adṛśyam golārdham golasūtrāntarālam tat bhūvyāsārdhādhikam |
GS41aryabhcu:7996: yaḥ punar draṣṭā tuṃgaśailamastake bhavati tat
GS41aryabhcu:7998: vidyādharādayaḥ viyati dūre sthitāḥ prabhūtam jyotiścakram paśyanti,
GS41aryabhcu:8000: atidūre sthitaḥ brahmā sarvadā vivasvantam paśyati |
GS41aryabhcu:8001: [bhūpṛṣṭhavyavasthitānām bhūvyāsārdhonabhapañjarārdhadarśinām svāt pramāṇāt satatam divasaḥ hīyate, niśā vardhate |
GS41aryabhcu:8002: tadartham] trairāśikam ã yadi ravikakṣyāyām ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ labhyante tadā bhūvyāsārdhayojanaiḥ 525 kiyatyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8003: labdhena dviguṇena sarvadā hīnaḥ divasaḥ adhikā rātriḥ || 15 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8006: devāḥ paśyanti bhagolārdham udaṅ merusaṃsthitāḥ savyam |
GS41aryabhcu:8008: [ udaṅ merusthitāḥ devāḥ bhagolasya uttaram] ardham savyam pradakṣiṇagatim paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:8009: dvitīyam ardham dakṣiṇam jyotiścakrasya apasavyam apradakṣiṇagatim baḍavāmukha[sthitāḥ] pretāḥ paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:8014: yatra vivasvān udeti sā prācī, [yatra astameti sā pratīcī]
GS41aryabhcu:8015: | [na tathā merubaḍavāmukhasthānām api, paritaḥ sarvatra raveḥ udayāstamayasambhavāt |]
GS41aryabhcu:8017: kaścit puruṣaḥ uttareṇa gataḥ deśāntaram eti tathātve dhruvam upari ārohitam paśyati,
GS41aryabhcu:8018: krameṇa merum prāptasya upari dhruvaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:8020: etat uttarāyaḥśalākāgrasvastikam upari nidhāya dakṣiṇāyaḥśalākāgrasvastikam ca adhomukham nidhāya darśayet |
GS41aryabhcu:8021: tathā laṅkāsthasya yaḥ viṣuvat mārgapradeśaḥ pūrvāparaḥ pratibhāsate sa merusthānām kṣitijāsaktaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:8022: | evam baḍavāmukhasthānām api cakravat bhāskaraḥ pratibhāsate || 16 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8024: merubaḍavāmukhasthāḥ kiyantam kālam ravim paśyanti iti āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:8025: ravivarṣārdham devāḥ paśyanti uditam ravim tathā pretāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8026: śaśimāsārdham pitaraḥ śaśigāḥ, kudinārdham iha manujāḥ || 17 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8027: devāḥ merunivāsinaḥ meṣādiṣu ṣaṭsu rāśiṣu samudgatam sūryam ravivarṣārdham paśyanti ṣaṇmāsān yāvat iti arthaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8028: pradakṣiṇam cakravat bhramantam kṣitijāsaktam krameṇa caturviṃśatikrāntibhāgān yāvat parityaktakṣitijam paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:8029: evam pretāḥ api ravivarṣārdham eva sakṛt udgatam sūryam paśyanti dakṣiṇagole ṣaṭsu rāśiṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:8032: candralokanivāsinaḥ pitaraḥ śaśinaḥ māsārdham pañcadaśatithayaḥ etāvantam kālam paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:8035: tataḥ yathā yathā savitā pratipadādiṣu parataḥ avalambate tathā tathā pitṝṇām madhyāhnottarabhāgaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8038: ataḥ teṣām pakṣaḥ ahaḥ, pakṣaḥ rātriḥ iti
GS41aryabhcu:8040: kudinam bhūdinam ravyudayāt ravyudayam yāvat, tadardham iha manujāḥ paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:8041: sarvam yathāvat sthitam gole pradarśayet iti || 17 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8044: pūrvāparam adhaūrdhvam maṇḍalam atha dakṣiṇottaram ca eva |
GS41aryabhcu:8049: dakṣiṇottarāvagāhi yāmya uttaramaṇḍalam upari adhaḥ ca janitasvastikam |
GS41aryabhcu:8050: kṣitijam samapārśvastham tathā anyat maṇḍalam tāvat eva |
GS41aryabhcu:8051: samapārśvāvagāhi parikaravat dikcatuṣṭayajanitasvastikam kṣitija iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:8053: yatra maṇḍale bhānām udayāstamayau lakṣyete | harijam
GS41aryabhcu:8054: iti kaiścit ucyate | ayam khagolaḥ sarvabhapañjarāṇām bahiḥ avatiṣṭhate || 18 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8057: pūrvāparadiglagnam kṣitijāt akṣāgrayoḥ ca lagnam yat |
GS41aryabhcu:8058: unmaṇḍalam bhavet tat kṣayavṛddhī yatra divasaniśoḥ || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8059: dakṣiṇottarakṣitijasvastikāt yāmya uttaramaṇḍale svadeśākṣabhāgatulye antare vedhe kṛtvā lohaśalākāgre praveśya golam nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:8063: dakṣiṇottarakṣitijasvastikayoḥ upari adhaḥ svadeśākṣabhāgatulye antare lagnam kārayet |
GS41aryabhcu:8066: yatra maṇḍale divasasya rātreḥ ca kṣayavṛddhī lakṣyete |
GS41aryabhcu:8067: viṣuvati unmaṇḍalakṣitijayoḥ ekatvāt divasaniśoḥ kṣayavṛddhī na staḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8068: viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa unmaṇḍalam upari kṣitijam adhaḥ avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:8069: tasmāt uttaragole aprāpte eva unmaṇḍalam [savitā] caradalaghaṭikāpramāṇena udeti |
GS41aryabhcu:8076: trairāśikam ã yadi ṣaṣṭyā grahabhuktiḥ labhyate, tadā caradalaghaṭikābhiḥ kiyatī iti |
GS41aryabhcu:8079: evam uttaradiśi vyavasthitānām krameṇa divasaniśoḥ mahatyau kṣayavṛddhī bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8080: yatra deśe raviḥ mithunāntasthaḥ na astam eti,
GS41aryabhcu:8085: tayā viparītakarmaṇā kṣitijyā ānīyate ã yadi vyāsārdhasya iyam [vyāsārdhatulyā]
GS41aryabhcu:8086: carajyā tadā mithunāntasvāhorātrārdhasya kā iti mithunāntasvāhorātrārdhatulyā kṣitijyā labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:8087: tasyāḥ kṣitijyāyāḥ mithunāntāpakramajyāyāḥ ca vargayuteḥ mūlam arkāgrā trijyātulyā |
GS41aryabhcu:8088_0: tena tatra deśe yāmya uttare kṣitijāt upari krameṇa [sama]maṇḍalam avagāhya khamadhyāt
GS41aryabhcu:8088_1: dakṣiṇena dvicatvāriṃśadbhāge [yāmya uttaram atikramya] tataḥ prathamodaye punar
GS41aryabhcu:8092: ã arkāgrayā iṣṭatulyayā kṣitijyā labhyate vyāsārdhena kim iti |
GS41aryabhcu:8093: guṇakabhājakayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ kṣitijyāpramāṇā akṣajyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:8096: uttareṇa tasmāt iyam vyavasthā na asti iti || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8099: pūrvāparadigrekhā adhaḥ ca ūrdhvā dakṣiṇottarasthā ca |
GS41aryabhcu:8100: etāsām sampātaḥ draṣṭā yasmin bhavet deśe || 20 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8101: pūrvāpararekhā, adhaḥ ca ūrdhvā ca yā rekhā, dakṣiṇottarasthā ca |
GS41aryabhcu:8103: etāsām rekhāṇām sampātaḥ ekatra yogaḥ, yasmin deśe draṣṭā tatra tatra tāsām sampātaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8105: yatra draṣṭā ravim udgacchan paśyati sā prācī,
GS41aryabhcu:8110: laṅkānivāsinām yadā madhyāhne raviḥ bhavati romakanivāsinām udeti |
GS41aryabhcu:8113: yadā romake madhyāhnaḥ tadā siddhapuranivāsinām udayaḥ [tatra romakapradeśe
GS41aryabhcu:8114: teṣām prācī] | tadapekṣayā teṣām svasthānāt uttaraḥ meruḥ | evam yamakoṭyām api |
GS41aryabhcu:8115: bhūmau yāvattāvatpramāṇam vṛttam ālikhya pūrvāhṇe [aparāhṇe ca] chāyām lakṣayet |
GS41aryabhcu:8116: yatra pradeśe śaṅkucchāyā vṛttam praviśati sā paścimā |
GS41aryabhcu:8124: ūrdhvam adhastāt draṣṭuḥ jñeyam dṛṅmaṇḍalam grahābhimukham |
GS41aryabhcu:8127: yatra draṣṭā bhavati tatra asya madhyam,
GS41aryabhcu:8129: yāvān dṛggrahayoḥ antaram tāvatā viṣkambhārdhena dṛṅmaṇḍalam pradṛśyam |
GS41aryabhcu:8130: tat eva madhyāhnasthite grahe dṛkkṣepamaṇḍalam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:8132: samamaṇḍalamadhyāt dakṣiṇena uttareṇa vā yatra grahābhimukham dṛṣṭeḥ kṣepaḥ tatra yaḥ mahāpramāṇakakṣyaḥ grahaḥ sa stokataram kṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8135: asya ānayanopāyaḥ ã prāglagnam syāt trirāśyūnam |
GS41aryabhcu:8138: śeṣebhyaḥ yāvat laṅkodayaprāṇāḥ śudhyanti tāvat śodhyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8140: śeṣaprāṇān triṃśatā guṇayet, aśuddhalaṅkodayena vibhajet, labdham bhāgādi
GS41aryabhcu:8143: aparāhṇe adhikatvāt raveḥ yāvantaḥ laṅkodayāḥ viśudhyanti tāvantaḥ prakṣipya lagnam kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:8144: ācāryeṇa sthūlaprakṛtyā iṣṭaghaṭikābhiḥ pūrvalagnam lagnavidhinā kṛtvā trirāśyūnam kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8146: rāśayaḥ laṅkodayaiḥ madhyam avagāhante iti laṅkodayaiḥ yat madhyalagnam tat sūkṣmam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:8147: tasya apakramakāṣṭham svadeśākṣabhāgayutam samadiśoḥ bhinnadiśoḥ viśuddham
GS41aryabhcu:8151: yataḥ vimaṇḍale candraḥ tataḥ akṣabhāgayutaviyutasya jyā candramadhyajyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:8155: kāṣṭhamayam samavṛttam samantataḥ samagurum laghum golam |
GS41aryabhcu:8156: pāratatailajalaiḥ tam bhramayet svadhiyā ca kālasamam || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8162: yadi atimātraguruḥ bhavati pāṣāṇavat niścalaḥ syāt,
GS41aryabhcu:8163: [mahatā kālena bhramati iti ataḥ] samavṛttam samagurum |
GS41aryabhcu:8165: etat guṇaviśiṣṭam golam katham bhramayet? pāratatailajalaiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:8166: svadhiyā ca svakīyaprajñayā ca tam bhramayet | kālasamam kālena
GS41aryabhcu:8168: kālasamam ahorātrasamam yathā bhramati tathā bhramayet |
GS41aryabhcu:8169: tat yathā ã ṣaṣṭighaṭikāṅkitasvāhorātramaṇḍale kanyātulāsandhipradeśe kīlakam īṣat unnatam ekam kārayet |
GS41aryabhcu:8171: pātram ca samam vattam dīrgham [tala]madhyanihitasūkṣmacchidram ghaṭikāṣaṣṭyā jalapūrṇam yathā riktam bhavati tathā svadhiyā prasādhya tataḥ karma kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:8172: yāvat pātrāt udakam sravati tāvat gurutvāt
GS41aryabhcu:8174: evam sakṛt yuktaḥ golaḥ paramārthabhagolavat ahorātre bhramati |
GS41aryabhcu:8175: prathamam tāmrakīlake pāśakasūtrasya ekam agram badhvā golayantram adhastāt prabhṛti pariveṣṭya tatra eva pradeśe sūtram prāpayet iti kramaḥ || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8185: bhūmau vṛttam ālikhya pūrvāparadakṣiṇottaradikcihnitam kṛtvā ekaikasmin caturthabhāge rāśitrayam aṅkayet |
GS41aryabhcu:8192: | samamaṇḍalasya viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa akṣatulyāntare avasthitatvāt akṣaḥ iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:8193: tasya akṣakāṣṭhasya bhujā, akṣajyā viṣuvajjyā iti paryāyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8198: samamaṇḍalamadhyāt dakṣiṇena ākṣajyātulye antare sūtrasya ekam agram badhvā graham prāpayet |
GS41aryabhcu:8207: sūryasya iṣṭāpakramajyāyāḥ candrasya iṣṭāpakramajyāyāḥ ca yaḥ vargaḥ sa iṣṭāpakramavargaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8208: tam vyāsārdhakṛteḥ viśodhya [śeṣasya] yat mūlam tat viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā ahorātrasya viṣkambhaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:8212: pūrvavidhinā tat uttaragole uttareṇa, dakṣiṇagole dakṣiṇena pradarśayet || 24 ||
GS41aryabhcu:8218: etābhiḥ guṇitam ahorātravyāsārdham svāhorātrārdhaviṣkambhaḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8219: kāṣṭhasya antaḥ kāṣṭhāntaḥ, tatra bhavam kāṣṭhāntyam |
GS41aryabhcu:8220: navatiḥ bhāgāḥ yasmin [kāṣṭhe tasya ante bhavam] yat svahorātrārdham tat eva [iṣṭa]jyābhiḥ guṇitam svahorātrārdhahṛtam svakīyasvakīyāhorātrārdhahṛtam phalam iṣṭalaṅkodayaprāgjyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:8221: ajāt meṣāt prabhṛti kāṣṭham bhavati iti kāṣṭhīkriyate |
